name: Fullest Volumizing Mascara
about: What it is:.Formulation Type:..Highlighted Ingredients:.....Ingredient Callouts:...What Else You Need to Know:...
ingredients: -Arginine: Supports stronger, healthier-looking lashes..-Provitamin B5: Nourishes to promote thicker-looking lashes..-Weightless Wax Blend: Adds full, flexible body without the weight...Aqua/Water/Eau, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire d'abeille, Synthetic Beeswax, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire de Carnauba, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Ethylhexyl Polyhydroxystearate, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Jojoba Esters, Acacia Senegal Gum, Panthenol, Benzyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Xanthan Gum, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Arginine, Lauric Acid, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Tocopherol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (u00b1): CI 77499 (Iron Oxide). ..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Nestle the brush into the base of lashes and glide upwards, wiggling from side to side..- Apply several coats for more volume and dimension..- Use the tip of the brush to separate and define hard-to-reach lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mascara last month and it is the worst mascara I have had in years. I can't get through a day without it smudging all over my eyelids (and I'm not even rubbing my eyes to make it smudge). I end up always looking like a raccoon. It it impossible to remove with make up remover at the end of day (a product I've never had an issue with removing mascara in the past). I also find it super clumpy and it does not give consistent length/supply of mascara throughout the lash. I never write reviews, but this has been weighing on me for some time so I felt compelled to say something. Not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have yet to find a mascara that doesn't irritate my eyes, flakes, or clumps. Ilia does none of that! It separates, goes on with a single swipe, and makes my lashes look super full. Winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good formula for volume, but I wouldn't buy it again. The molded brush is rough on my eyes, and even with setting spray tends to wear off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every mascara I used to use caused my eyelashes to fall out, but since I started using this product, I no longer have that problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best mascara you can buy. It lasts all day and the two wands make it convenient. My lashes always look so good when I wear this mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best mascara I've used in awhile.  I don't find it clumpy like other reviewers.  I use an eyelash comb with all mascara though. This mascara has AMAZING hold though! Curl my lashes and they stay for houses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this clumps so bad DO NOT BUY it's overprice garbage. no wearing mascara is better than this

reviews.review_text: After using this mascara for a couple of months, I'm very disappointed in the quality. I like that this product is clean which is why I gave it two starts.  It's extremely clumpy and smudges after a few hours.  I will not be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product goes on clumpy. The clean label is important to me.

reviews.review_title: My new favorite mascara, hands down!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ILIA's Fullest Volumizing Mascara has become my favorite mascara I have ever used. I didn't think any product could beat my last favorite but this one does by a long shot! Their formula is absolutely incredible. I have worn it to multiple concerts and it is definitely sweat proof. I wore it for three weeks on Grand Cayman and it is definitely waterproof as well. I would put it on first thing in the morning, go snorkeling until dusk, then go out to dinner. We would get back to our condo late at night and my mascara looked like I had just put it on. This will now forever be my go to mascara. I wish it was a little more affordable, but it is definitely worth the price. *I received this product for free from Ilia and PINCHme in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara in Classic Black from PinchMe in exchange for review. The tube is thick, ergonomic to hold, & easy to use. For day-to-day wear, this mascara is fine. I did experience some occasional smudging. I found the hourglass wand a bit challenging to navigate, especially on my lower lashes. I also feel like the wand shape caused the product to clump up in a weird way when being returned to the tube, and the stopper eventually got semi-clogged with clumpy product that would then transfer to the lashes. I think this would be a good product for someone who only uses mascara on the upper lash line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from PINCHme for testing purposes. I love ILIA and this mascara worked beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible. Smudges and smears big time. I would not recommend. The wand makes no sense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love Merit mascaras so much because they wash off so easily and make my lashes look amazing, but they always end up smelling weird and making my eyelids irritated.... not sure if anyone else has this problem. This is my third tube that has ended up smelling weird about a week after opening :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is so clumpy! I love the other one but this one makes my lashes feel so heavy and stubby. Save your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Ilia mascara and tend to have pretty sensitive eyes that are easily irritated by most eye makeup. The clean formula has literally never given me issue and I'm a loyalist to their mascara; however, the Fullest Volumizing Mascara seems to clump more than the Limitless Lash Lengthening Mascara making application messier and eyelash definition/separation worse. I definitely will not be buying this one again, but if you like clumpy lashes, it might be for you. I'll stick with their limitless mascara going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been repurchasing this mascara for over a year now and I love it! I've tried so many mascaras and this is the only one that I've found that doesn't have a problem in some way and doesn't clump or smudge. It makes my lashes look so long and I get so many compliments on them now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would love this mascara if it didn't run under my eyes within an houru2026 at first I thought it was the summer heat when I first started wearing this in August, but nope- even in cold weather. It does give great volume and pigment, and I love that it's clean and doesn't irritate my eyes. Wished it was more waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved brush and application but smears. I do not wear mascara on my bottom lashes, and after about an hour, my under eyes were black.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin

I also like how this mascara doesn't have the bad chemicals that mess with your eyes and stuff. 10/10 recommend!! u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_title: Essentially a pricy tube of clumps
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently broke my drug-store cosmetics habit and purchased Ilia's Fullest Volumizing Mascara, having read really good reviews of it. $38 CAD later, I was deeply disappointed to find it clumpier - even from first use - than any $8 product I've ever tried. Two uses later, I just gave up and tossed it in the garbage. Saddest waste of money ever. u2639ufe0f
I buy yesterday and after i try make my eyes burn .I dont recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Does exactly what it says. Comes off easy and doesn't drip throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very short, thin, sparse lashes with hooded monolids so I have a hard time finding mascara that actually makes a noticeable difference in the volume and length of my lashes without smudging.  I love Ilia products because they are clean and cruelty-free but this mascara didn't really do it for me.  The wand applicator is nice and while it did provide a little bit of volume, I did experience smudging throughout the day.  To be fair, I have this problem with most mascaras so maybe smudging is just always going to be in the cards for me due to my eye shape and heavily hooded monolids.  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: An excellent choice for everyday indoor and professional wear. It defines lashes beautifully while not making them look artificial.

I look like a raccoon! I tried it a few different times and it's so bad I had to throw it out; a complete waste of money.

I never have any eye sensitivity from it, and it comes off easy with my oil based cleanser.  While I have received this sample, I have since purchased it twice!

reviews.review_text: I have thin lashes so I always looking for a mascara that will help with that problem. Ilia mascara is the solution! It makes my lashes look thick and full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of the Ilia fullest volumizing mascara to try for free in exchange for an honest review. Personally I found this formula works well and doesn't clump, smudge, or flake. After applying I like to use a clean spoolie to help remove excess product and remove any that got on my skin during application. The design of the application head does seem to provide good volume. All in all I think this is a solid mascara choice by Ilia.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample from PinchMe. I love this mascara! It made my lashes fuller and thicker without clumps! I plan on buying more when this runs out.

reviews.review_title: I need this in waterproof it's now my go to!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's tube is wider then the tubes I'm used however it fit comfortably in my hand The brush is shaped like an hour glass thinner in the center but it doesn't pull out more or to much product. The top and bottom bristles pull out just enough to cover my lashes usually applying 2-3 coats depending if there's a special occasion where I'd want length and volume. It doesn't clump on my lashes at all allowing me to achieve a flake and transfer free application. I honestly love how smoothly Ilia mascara glides on my lashes evenly and smoothly I've been using the same mascara around 35-40 years. I absolutely love how my lashes look and feel so lightweight after applying. Removing was a breeze I used a cleansing balm it removed immediately.

reviews.review_title: A winner to have in your beauty routine.

It did add some volume to my lashes, but not what I would think of as Fullest.  I do like that it is clean, safe for me with contact lenses, and removes easily.

reviews.review_text: I had trouble with the lengthening Ilia mascara stinging my eyes so I was skeptical about this one but I am pleasantly surprised! It hasn't clumped, gives a nice length and subtle volume to my lashes and doesn't flake after a few hours.  I put it through quite a few gym workouts including a spin class with sweat in my eyes and did not have any stinging and it stayed mostly in tact! I gave it four stars because It starts to get a little clumpy if I try to build up to a super glam volume. Also the brush shape doesn't fit my eye size so it builds volume in the wrong spot unless I use only the tip which takes longer to apply.  Overall I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a great every day clean mascara. I received this for free from Pinchme in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from PinchMe for my honest review. I do like this mascara. I don't like that is very thin BUT it is a buildable mascara. I used 3 layers and it did my eyelashes amazing!

reviews.review_title: My new favorite mascara, it's sure to be your new
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite mascara, it's sure to be your new favorite too! This mascara is optimally volumizing and covers each lash for an enhanced look of fuller lashes. It is easy to apply, buildable, and best of all it doesn't clump, smudge, or flake. Importantly, it is Clean make-up, and cruelty-free. I love that it has added benefits that help to achieve stronger and healthier-looking lashes. So weightless and long-lasting wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this Fullest Volumizing Mascara by Ilia. The wand is so cool. Love the hourglass shape of it and the formula is great!  The packaging is very classy. I love how my lashes look when I use this mascara. They look fuller than usual. I would buy this again.  Fuller than usual

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have blonde lashes so I won't leave the house without mascara on this mascara did it's job and made my lashes visible but I did have to put on multiple layers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Pinchme. I've been using this mascara for about 2 weeks now. What I love the most about it is that it does not clump like my other mascara. It goes on easily and defines my lashes, but it also gives a more natural eyelash look. I sweat a lot and I've worn it at the gym. Even if it isnt waterproof, I didn't notice a lot of smudging even though there was some. While the mascara lengthens my lashes, I do wish that it would add a bit more volume for a more dramatic look. I do still like it though and appreciate that it's a clean product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in my Pinchme box as a free sample. I love this mascara!!! It lengthens my lashes and gives amazing volume.  It didn't smudge either.  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Good but formula is a little thin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara from PinchMe in exchange for my honest review. I was excited to receive this product, because I love the ILIA brand. I tested this over several weeks. Upon opening it I noticed it was a little on the watery side. I have thin straight lashes so I often need a thicker product. I applied 3-5 coats, but was unable to achieve the level of volume I was looking for and because of the liquidy texture applied a good amount to my eye lid as well. The next few times I used it I applied a base coat of another mascara and then followed up with the ILIA mascara. This helped a bit. I did notice after about a week the formula did thicken up a bit (I assume from oxygen being introduced to the tube) and it applied much easier. The highlights of this product are: It does not flake, It does not smear, and it washes off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this mascara! First of all, I love that it is clean. It did a great job with increasing the volume of my lashes. It is very buildable, but I felt like one coat was all that I needed. It didn't flake or smudge. My one dislike is that I found it very difficult to clean off of my lashes completely. Overall, a very good mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've read some of the more negative reviews and see a trend that these reviewers didn't get enough volume. It says in the directions to add up to seven layers to achieve a dramatic volume on your lashes! My before and after show my natural lashes and what they looked like after only three layers. Personally, I believe ILIA knocked it out of the park with this mascara! It's made with clean ingredients, it doesn't leave flakes on my face, and it doesn't look or feel heavy on my eyelashes. It's a great mascara for anyone who has sensitive eyes too. It's not waterproof so it washes off easily, just make sure you don't wear it on a rainy day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A super formula that lengthens and gives me fluttery lashes without going over the top. I wore this mascara for my wedding, and was very pleased with the wear and look. I tend to wear a very subtle everyday look for work, and it works just as well with a little lip balm and eyebrows as with a full face of makeup.  It removes well, but does tend to leave a little residue the next day even with thorough cleansing, so 4/5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara in exchange for a review. Overall I liked this mascara. It has good coverage for a natural look with one application. You can apply more coats for a heavier coverage. I will say it's hard to get a dramatic lash from it but if that's not what your looking for on the daily then you will love this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara thanks to pinchme.com , I think is a good mascara and adds some volume to my lashes but is not the best I've tried. It's has an average performance. The curved applicator doesn't make it easy to apply  for short lashes like mine. I like it but it was not a favorite for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The ILIA Fullest Volumizing mascara just may be my new favorite mascara! It gave me full and dramatic looking eyelashes without veing over-the-top, and lasted throughout an evening at an outdoor rock concert! Easy to apply and easy to remove. I received this product for free from Pinchme in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Clean, perfect and a new go to for my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the ILIA mascara for a few weeks now and love it!  It adheres easily to the brush with enough moisture to have an easy transfer to my lashes.  It applies easily and stays on the duration of the day without smudging.  I love the wand/brush design and find that it helps get the little lashes at the end of my eyes better than other wands.  I also love that it is a clean and cruelty free product!  I did receive this product for free and am leaving this honest review as part of the feedback process.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this volumizing mascara by Ilia  and after using it I did notice my lashes being longer and fuller, it is gentle and doesn't cause irritation as some other mascaras I've used before. it's buildable so  you can choose to go more natural or build it up for a more glamorous look .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from pinch me. It is a pretty good mascara and I appreciate the clean ingredients but it did not replace the ones I already like the best. I prefer a more dramatic lash though so this might be perfect for those that like a more subtle lash look.  Overall I liked it for a softer look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great applicator, very nice packaging! The mascara does come out a little clumpy, and I do often have to separate my lashes with a brush. Would not recommend unless you have enough time to fix up your mascara before heading out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is pretty decent. Easy on easy off! True black not super dark

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ILIA has created my perfect mascara! I've been using this incredible mascara for over a month now, and I'm obsessed! This formula is lightweight and buildable, and stays flexible and soft all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is actually pretty good I like the brush a lot it helps when you take it out seems a little thick otherwise works really good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unlike a lot of the mascara I had, this one feels really light on my lashes.  It gave my lashes a lift and I could definitely build up the volume if I need it.  I wore it for more than 12 hours without smudges.  The shape of the brush also makes it easier to apply mascara around the corner.  I love this mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Ilia products. However this just didn't work for me. I didn't get any volume or anything other than some color on my lashes. I received this product for my review from OunchMe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this mascara, I will be purchasing again in the future. It helped give the voluminous look I like without irritating my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite clean mascaras. Gives the lashes a beautiful lift that doesn't flake or fall throughout the day. I took off 1 star because it has an interesting scent but otherwise I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free full size sample of Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara in black. I love mascara. If I could only have one cosmetic, it would be mascara. That being said, I loved the Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara's brush. It was gentle. But the mascara itself was a bit dry. I don't know if they are all like that or just the one I received.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receive the ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara for free in exchange for an honest review.  This was one of the best mascaras I've used, primarily because it is one of the very few that does not give me irritation or cause sensitivity throughout the day. The mascara certainly adds volume and I did not notice flaking after long hours of use. The only thing I did not like was the shape of the applicator, it is too big and made my lashes stick together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! I have sparse lashes & am working on growing them with latisse. This mascara really fills in the sparseness and makes my weak lashes look great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara!!!  It gives me more volume than any other brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I love ILIA products and have a few of them. I used it really fluffed my lashes! My lashes are difficult to work with, and this impressed me. It didn't feel heavy or weigh my lashes down. The only reason that I am giving it 4 stars is because there was a fallout compared to my other ones. If I could figure out how to prevent that, I would use it more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fullest volumizing mascara by Ilia, it makes my eyelashes look super thick. I only used one coat! When I'm going out at night, I do 2 coats for extra extra volume. Plus, the tube is so cute and stylish. Great mascara! Already purchased one for my mom too and she loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that Ilia is a clean beauty brand and I like the end result from using this fullest volumising mascara but I'm not a fan of the applicator brush.  After applying it onto my lashes, it did give an appearance of fuller more lush lashes.  If I could get past the brush, it would be perfect to me.  I appreciate Ilia sending me a sample to try and give my honest opinion.  I'm on the fence as to whether I would purchase one in the future.  I'd still recommend it to try as not everyone will have issues with the applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara in Black from PinchMe and it's chefs kiss. My lashes are so full and voluminous I was so surprised it's not clumpy I applied 2 coats and they look amazing. This is a 100% recommendation it's definitely a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a this mascara from PinchMe in exchange for my honest opinion and love it!  My lashes are stick straight and very light.  This mascara makes them visible and dark.  The photo shows one eye with the mascara and one without.  It goes on easily, can be layered, stays on all day and comes off easily at the end of the day.  It didn't feel heavy and didn't smudge or flake.  I also love that this is a clean product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara free from PINCHme in exchange for my honest review. I have been wearing this Mascara for a couple of weeks now, and let me tell you: I Love It! This Mascara has an hourglass shaped wnad that does wonders for a non-clumpy, sleek look. This is an easy application and a long lasting wear type of product. My lashes have never felt so little clumping like this in a long time. ILIA never  fails me on products, I have loved every beauty product I have tried from ILIA. I can Now add this beautiful Mascara to my ILIA  Faves list. I highly  recommend trying this product along with many of their other high quality beauty products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my favorite mascara! It is easy to apply, doesn't clump or flake, gives my lashes volume leaving them looking fuller and longer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free full size of this from Pinch me and I actually gave it to my son,who does drag.He loves it! He said it's by far the BEST mascara he's used.There's no clump!my even thought he puts on multiple coats.it's easy to remove and his own lashes feel better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good mascara make what it say, easy to remove and have a little fallout, is good but to pricey there are better and cheaper alternatives, btw I received this free from Pinchme so I did not buy it and I'm not sure if I will buy it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for my honest review. I love the rich color and the thickness that I my lashes having when I use it. I would purchase it and recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this mascara for free I'm exchange for my review. I love that it's a clean product so I feel better about what's going on my face. The brush is unique and took me a little bit of practice to get uses to. The mascara definitely added length and volume to my short straight lashes but I noticed that they didnt stay like that after a few hours. I didn't have a problem with clumping but it did smudge under my eyes around mid-day. My lashes looked great but I needed to touch them up after a few hours.

reviews.review_title: Overall a great product that I highly recommend!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Ilia fullest volumizing mascara in exchange for a fair and honest review from the pinch me website. For starters this brand is one that I fully trust and have had a lot of success with different products of theirs. They make products that truly perform without chemicals that I don't trust. As for this volumizing mascara, I give it five stars as I really like how well it performs. It has a large fluffy brush that helps to apply mascara without too many coats or without clumping. This does not smudge terribly for me. The packaging is very simple but easy to hold. This also removes easily using an oil-based cleanser followed by a foaming cleanser. Overall a great product that I highlyrecommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving the results of using this mascara ! I received this mascara for free from pinchme.com. This mascara left my lashes looking amazing. The only reason I give it a 4 is because I had some fall out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was able to try this for free from a sample website, I really like the mascara. It gives a natural look without adding too much volume or thickness like other mascaras. The reason for 4 not 5 stars is I did have a little fallout throughout the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Technically, I'm writing this review because I received a full size tube from PinchMe for free.  HOWEVER, I have been purchasing this mascara on my own for a while now because I really like it a lot (I usually purchase the mini because I use several brands and they tend to go bad before I can get my money's worth from a full size tube).   Pros: this gives a really full, soft look.  It can be more dramatic if you really layer it on, but I love that it's full and soft and natural looking. Cons: because I have deep set eyes, most regular (non-tubing) mascaras will transfer to my brow bone throughout the day, and this is no exception.  However, it is minimal and if this isn't something you normally struggle with, you likely won't have any issues with this transferring or flaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara from PinchMe to try in exchange for an honest review. So far I haven't had any bad experiences with Ilia products, only good! This mascara has a wand that fits the lashes like a glove, making sure you don't have to hold it in several directions during the application process. I haven't experienced any smudging or running. This mascara keeps the lashes covered nicely all day and it's easy to remove when you're ready. Beautiful lashes from a company that does a fantastic job with helping women look beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pair with the lengthening mascara for great results!! No need for false eyelashes with this routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Pinchme and ilia in exchange for my honest review. The first few uses of this product I didn't like it. The brush was super wet and had so much product on it that it just got clumpy and difficult to put on nicely. After the first few uses though my lashes have better separation and volume. I do also use a primer to help. I will say it can be kind of smudgy and when it's hot I've noticed some smudges around my eye, but I don't always put it on my lower lashes so it hasn't transferred too bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara.  ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara darkens, volumizes,  and lenghtens  my lashes for that glamorous dramatic bold look. This mascara doesn't clump or smudge. It is lightweight and buildable. Wonderful product I highly recommend giving it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the look of this mascara but wore it on a warm evening out with friends and when I got home I realized it had smudged all over my upper eyelids. I looked ridiculous. Good for winter weather but not hot days

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from PinchMe in exchange for my honest review.  Let me start by saying I am a big fan of Ilia products but this one was a miss for me.  I love the shape of the wand but found it clumped too quickly.  I expect it to clump after a couple of months of use because the mascara gets old but this clumped on me immediately.  It's unfortunate because I like Ilia's Limitless mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the brush on the wand, it gets every lady with no clumping. I have to use 2 or 3 coats. Just with it was slightly thicker but other than that, the big brush gets every lash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The amount of volume I received with this mascara is fantastic. I absolutely love the wand and the brush. The brush is perfect for getting the best coverage. Pleasantly surprised. I am so thankful to #Pinchme.com  for allowing me to try this for free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The ILIA mascara is a nice non clumping mascara. I would say it is a natural day time mascara since it isn't a super bold or volumizing formula for my short and straight lashes. I don't think it is that great for curling or holding a curl so I would definitely do a prep before applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Pinch Me in exchange for my honest review. I'm a huge fan of ILIA products... and mascaras. So I was extremely excited to try the new mascara. But, I require a lot from a mascara. I love a bold, false lash look and need the mascara to hold a curl. This mascara checks most of the boxes. It gives volume and lengthens, but looks more natural and does not hold a curl. Overall, this won't take the place of my daily go to mascara but I will use it on my no makeup makeup days. In my photo I have it on one eye while the other is bare.

reviews.review_title: Stays gunky/soft on lashes and clumps terrible.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free tube of this mascara from pinchme for review.  I liked it at first, but summertime is not the right time for this mascara. The reason is that when you're outside and it is hot out and/or humid, it all gets clumpy and soft and your lashes just join together in big clumps. Its like it never sets - just stays sort of gunky. You can start out with it dried down and set just fine, but once you enter a hot or humid area, like near the beach etc, the mascara softens on your lashes and just sort of melts and the lashes just clump together. It's a mess. It leaves racoon eyes on top and bottom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample in exchange for my honest review. I love this mascara. The brush was able to reach my smaller lashes and the lash corners. Helped give volume to my lashes without clumping or flaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara would be perfect for people who want a clean mascara that looks very natural. Product dud leave my lashes very black and slightly lengthened, but I didn't notice any additional volume. I did definitely notice the fallout and smudging that had my husband asking if one of my children accidentally hit me. I tried it again and had huge smudges under my eyes within 30 minutes.  So if you want the natural look, I suggest trying it after your other products have dried out completely and possibly in a low humidity situation. I received this product from PinchMe and Ilia in return for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Basics: u2b50ufe0f Clean, volumizing mascara; u2b50ufe0f Safe for sensitive eyes  Promises: u2b50ufe0f Wraps each lash with weightless, buildable formula without flaking or smudging; u2b50ufe0f Thickens and defines lashes from root to tip; u2b50ufe0f Clean, nourishing ingredients condition with every coat for fuller and thicker lashes; u2b50ufe0f Flake-resistant formula that washes of easily; u2b50ufe0fOpthalmologist-tested and safe for sensitive eyes and contact lenses wearers; u2b50ufe0f Flexible nylon micro bristles of a violin-shaped brush catches every lash, coating them with the perfect amount each time.  The Verdict: u2b50ufe0fI didn't love this mascara. u2b50ufe0f I have long, full lashes that are a bit straight and the mascara didn't have a wow effect. u2b50ufe0f I did experience flaking and smudging after a few hours. u2b50ufe0f The brush didn't catch every lash, in fact it was rather clumpy. u2b50ufe0f After double cleansing, I still had mascara residue on my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara was definitely not for me. I started by curling my lashes, as I have very straight lashes, and then applied the mascara. Immediately my lashes went back straight. I let them dry and then I tried to curl them up at least a little bit and they looked semi decent. But, I left the house and went to my mother's about 5 minute drive away and by the time I got there I had to wash my eyes. They were irritated. Never have I had to immediately wash off a mascara. I enjoy other Ilia products, but this is definitely not one of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received from PinchMe in return for my honest review. I've been loving Ilia products but this one did not do it for me. It could be because I have super oily skin and it's been over 100 degrees here lately but I experienced a lot of smudging and long dry down with this formula. Don't get me wrong, it definitely makes my lashes more noticeable but not in a dramatic, lengthening or fuller way. It is very natural looking and not clumpy or spidery. The application want is kind of clunky and may attribute to product getting on eyelids. I will definitely try again when the weather is cooler but this likely won't replace my favorite Tarte Maneater mascara.

reviews.review_title: Great mascara but does transfer on occasion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara as a free product trial through PinchMe. I genuinely do like this mascara and feel like the formula builds up on my lashes pretty well without clumping. I also do like the shape of the wand, being an hourglass, and feel like it does a good job reaching all of my lashes and coating them evenly. My main complaint is that I have noticed it does transfer on my hooded eyelids if it's warm out or if my face is just oily (it is not water proof). It's definitely not nearly as bad transferring as other mascaras I've tried though. It also does not flake which is also a plus! Overall I do really like the mascara and would consider purchasing in the near-future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the other Ilia products I have tried but was disappointed with this mascara. It was fine but nothing special. I found the applicator brush to be akward and the results just average. I would not purchase this particular mascara.

reviews.review_title: It's been my go-to since I tried it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara for free for my honest review. For reference, my lashes are short, blonde, straight, thin and sparse. I'm including before and after pics. This mascara adds volume and length. I don't get a lot of clumping or flaking. It's never smudged. I wear contact lenses and it's never irritated my eyes. I can sum this up by saying that since I received this, it's been in my everyday makeup bag. I own probably 7-8 different mascaras and I really like this one. I can use the tip of it to add length before I add volume. Try this!

reviews.review_title: Pretty good but smudged quite a bit under my eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I do like this mascara but after using it many times I can say that it's not my favorite. I really cannot recommend it for one main reason. It does a nice job of volumizing my lashes and I think the pigmentation is very good. I was not thrilled that I keep getting smudging under my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a great volumizing mascara that emphasizes the eyes beautifully. However it smudges under my eyes, so I have to check it multiple times a day ( even with powder). I received this product from PINCHme for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Mascara wasn't bad. Nice color. But it didn't give me the length I hoped for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of the Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara in classic black in exchange for my honest review. I usually use a lengthening mascara with a very thin brush so this was hard for me to get used to. The brush is a unique shape and a little wide on the end for me to get the lashes in the corner by my eye. I prefer the skinny precision brushes. However, the mascara does do what it says and volumizes my lashes nicely. I like that it is clean beauty and would recommend it if you need volumizing. If you need lengthening like I do, look for a different mascara. I have not tried Ilia's Limitless Lash mascara but it looks like what I would prefer over this volumizing one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Ilia mascara is my holy grail at the moment. the first couple of uses weren't the best. it finally hit that sweet spot. it has great dark black pigment. it gives volume & length. I can't rave about this mascara enough. I really love all the Ilia products I have tried. amazing brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying an ILIA product. I received it from ILIA & PINCH ME in exchange for my honest review. I have very sparse, short lashes that are hardly noticeable. The brush, for me, was too big and was messy for me to use. That is due to the sparseness and shortness of my lashes. I ended up getting more on my lid than I did my lashes. In my younger days I wouldn't have had any problems with the brush, so that is my fault. The mascara did go on smoothly, when I could actually get it on the lashes instead of my eyes. lol The black color is a rich, deep black color. I hate that it didn't work for me but I'm sure that it would work great for a lot of other ladies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Better than I expected.  I have the worst luck with  flaking, clumpy mascaras that make my eyes water all day. I had no reaction to this one so great if you have sensitive eyes. I like how it darkened my lashes and and made them look longer and fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received  ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara for free  in return for my honest review.  I love that ILIA makes cruelty free natural products.  I liked this mascara.  It is smudgeproof.  It is easy to apply and also comes off easily.  It has buildable color and volume. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After I received this as a sample from I was so excited to try it. The wear lasted all day. I love how pigmented the black was. It did make my eyelashes look long but expected it to add volume but it did not. Over all it is a natural product and that is a win for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this ILIA Volumizing mascara as a free sample from Pinchme for my honest review. I used another of their mascara and I loved it, this one is no different. I got great results and I used 2 coats, had I used a couple more I'm sure I would have gotten even whether results. I'm waiting to see if they have a waterproof mascara soon. They have other great products too that I like and use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an honest review from a promotion through PinchMe. First and foremost since my first try me of Ilia foundation and wanting clean products for my makeup I have become an Ilia only for me. I absolutely love the mascara and have purchased it many times. I just hope some day they make a brown version.  I will wear the black as it is the only option. My lashes look fuller and honestly I think they are healthier since using the Ilia Mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i was pleasantly surprise with the ease ofnthe use of this product. Easy to apply and easy to remove. Very little mess

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this mascara does not stay on for me. It smudges easily. I do like the lightweight formula and the brush is okay. It didn't seem to do much to enhance my lashes though. Won't repurchase this. I received this product for free in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara in exchange for my honest review. I love this brand and was excited to try this product. First of all, let me say that my lashes are short and fine. After Covid I feel like they are more sparse as well. The formula isn't too wet which I really like. The brush is perfection and able to catch all the short lashes. This mascara makes my lashes look full and long! It helps them to stay up all day long and doesn't flake onto my lower lids which is something I've had issues with previously. I also love the ingredient list and appreciate that it doesn't have chemicals that are bad for me. I would absolutely recommend this mascara to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mascara for a bout a week now, and I love it! The brush is the perfect shape, the mascara doesn't flake or come off with sweat, and it doesn't clump

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Ilia products. This mascara is not my favorite however I do like the other mascara that they carry about. I will be purchasing that one going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using  ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara my eyes are more dramatic looking. I like it very much. It's just a little hard to apply because the wand is so small.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara for free in exchange for my honest review from Pinchme.com. I have to say I love this mascara. It has amazing ingredients and it goes on smooth with no clumps. The brush's curves actually help with the distribution of the product preventing lumps which is great. It also stayed put all day and wasn't hard to remove when I got home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara was sent to me complementaryby ILIA and Pinchme in return for my honest review.  I personally love ILIA cruelty free natural products and use them regularly.  I love this mascara.  The brush deposits the right amount of color and volume and length and definition to the lashes.  It is smudgeproof.  It is easy to apply and also come off easy.  It is buildable.  I love the final product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved a free sample of the ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara from pinchme.com. I love this mascara. It is great for full face makeup or with just gloss for a really natural look. I like the shape of the brush as it makes it very easy to apply to lower lashes without bumping your skin and smearing. I have had great luck wearing this mascara all day at work and ice had no issues with flaking or smudging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara my lashes look thick and large and the wand is perfect for applying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! It really adds volume to my lashes. As other reviews have mentioned, the brush is really large so it does take some time to get used to it compared to other products I have used. I got a free sample of this product from PinchMe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this message that free for review. I wanted to really like this product, but I just can't get past the wand. I hate the shape of this wand. The mascara itself is nice. It's a rich black color and it comes off easily on the lashes and it didn't leave me with raccoon eyes at the end of the day, but I just can't get past the shape of the wand if that was changed this would totally be five out of five.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Melts and smudges around eyes in hot weather. Really bad. Not worth the money. Returning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wanting to try out Ilia's mascara for a while because I like their other products so much and this did not disappoint. It's a really nice volumizing  mascara with ingredients that are good for your lashes and safe for your eyes. It's easy to apply and looks amazing on. I experienced some slight clumping but nothing terrible. It's also super easy to remove. I wasn't sure if I would like the brush shape but it does a really nice job of coating your lashes.  I was lucky enough to receive a free sample in exchange from an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this free full size sample black mascara from Pitchme. I love the way the product looks, it's very beautiful & chic looking. It gave my lashes more volume, doesn't smudge as much & last almost all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this ilia fullest volumizing mascara in black as a free sample. I was excited to try it bc I don't typically use volume zing mascara but like the idea of it. I liked the packaging, it's a nice looking tube and easy to hold & open. However, I am not a huge fan of how it feels during application. I feel like it's too thick & the shape of the wand makes it difficult to apply evenly to all of my lashes. It went on uneven & clumpy, I had to use an eyelash brush every time to separate large clumps. It also flakes somewhat throughout the day which is a frustration of mine with mascara. Lastly, it's very hard to remove! Leaves dark black under my eyes. I swam with it on once & it left black under & around that I had trouble getting off without stitches bbqing my u der eye area roughly. Not for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from PINCHme for my honest review. Ilia mascara lengthened my lashes without clumping or flaking. I really liked the way my lashes looked so full and long.  I received many compliments on how pretty my lashes looked. I will be using this mascara from now on because it really works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't expecting much from Ilia's Fullest Volumizing Mascara, I mean how different could it be from the mascaras I've used in the past? I was pleasantly surprised. I love the hour glass wand, the was if application and how very full my lashes look, it's my new favorite go to mascara!

reviews.review_title: Must-have mascara to give lashes a boost
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara Classic Black free from PINCHme in exchange for my honest review. The first thing I noticed was the pretty packaging. I was immediately drawn to the lovely lilac box and beige tube. My eyelashes are short, thin and very sparse. Therefore, I was extremely excited to try this product. Application was easy and the mascara was non-clumping. My lashes looked thicker, slightly longer and more dramatic. I used in combination with my black liquid eyeliner for an even more defined look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product from PinchMe. I love the applicator brush and how it hugs my lashes.  The mascara made my lashes look full of volume and really made my eyes pop.  The mascara stayed in place all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ilia is a favorite mascara of mine.  Love that they have a variety of mascaras to choose from and I've tried several and have never been disappointed.  The mascara is easy to apply and my lashes look longer with more volume and no clumping!

reviews.review_title: Finally found a mascara that does it ALL!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using ILIA Fullest Mascara I had so many complements and it was easy to apply and no need for any touch ups, no smudging or clumping. I had lifted, defined volume lashes even when sweating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love  ILIA  FULLEST VOLUMIZING MASCARA because I have thinner eye lashes so I tired other mascara and it never made my lashes looked full and stand out till I tried this mascara so if you don't were fake eye lashes for the fullest but want your natural eye lashes really stand out i would tried this mascara you are going to love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love ilia products. This is one the best non irritating formulas for volume. I'd like to have a little more length but it's my fave for soft glam. Easy to build without clumping and doesn't flake. Easy removal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. It is lightweight and volumizing. It is buildable, not sticky, doesn't flake nor smudge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a definite new favorite of mine. It doesn't smudge or flake, and best of all, it doesn't irritate my sometimes sensitive eyes. It lasts me all day and is easy to remove.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use several Ilia products in my usual beauty routine, but this was my first time trying an Ilia mascara. This is a good mascara as a go-to for daytime wear. It gave my lashes good separation, definition, and length without being clumpy. It's not dramatic and glam enough to function as an evening mascara for me, but it's perfect for my everyday look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from @PinchMe. It is a high quality mascara. The brush is not the best I have used. It tends to clump. That was the only issue I had with it, otherwise it is a great product. I love all of the Ilia products!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice mascara. Coverage is great. Thickening ability is awesome. Adds length also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Pinchme in exchange for my honest review. I've used it for several days and  have not found it to be a favorite. The unique shape of the wand does not work well for me and I find the mascara doesn't enhance my lashes as much as I would like. Also it tends to flake after several hours.

reviews.review_title: clean products make me feel better!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the Ilia brand in general. I've been so pleased with every product of theirs that I have tried.  I love that this mascara does not have a smell to it, like so many others. It feels cleaner! The brush shape is a lot of fun too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Non-clumping and easily buildable formual. I haven't experienced any flakes or smudges. It gives me really pretty lashes, with lots of added length and volume. The only thing I dislike is the shape of the brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this mascara! I received the Ilia fullest volumizing mascara to test, and I'm so glad I did! It separates each of my lashes, and makes them look full. I like how the wand is shaped like an hour glass which helps when applying and spreading my lashes out. I definitely recommend this mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. It's great for its higher price point when compared to cheaper brands. It doesn't clump my lashes and gives a nice natural look. It also doesn't have a smell like other high end brands do. It doesn't rub off until it's time to wash. I love the brush it's perfect for fluffing lashes. I only wish it would lengthen my lashes a little more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Fullest Volumizing Mascara has an hourglass shaped wand.  I am not a fan of this shape.  I do not understand the narrow middle or how that can be helpful when applying mascara.  I prefer a straight or triangular shape myself.  The mascara is a nice formula.  It applies well without clumping and is easily buildable.  I have not experienced any flaking and only minimal smudging in the outer corners, which is quite common for me especially when I smile a lot.  It holds up well all day and is easily removable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara to try for free. I like the simple packaging. I naturally have curly long lashes so most mascaras work well for me. I definitely think my lashes are more defined, the mascara did add some volume but it is also a little clumpy. I do like it because my lashes are more defined and it opens my eyes more. Based on my experience I would recommend but I will leave the before and after pictures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved ilia when i got a sample from the birthday gifts and had no problems. I decided to buy this product. First few days were good but after a week, I noticed my eyelashes falling out more than usual. I stopped using and my eyelashes stopped falling out at a rapid rate

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara to try for an honest review. I ama fan of Ilia products and now am going to use their mascara.  It goes on well - no flaking or smudging which worries me.  Wears well and gives my lashes u201clifeu201d and looks natural not cakey.  And the mascara easily comes off when removing makeup.  Definitely try it and it will be your new favorite mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from pinchme.com for my honest review.  This made my eyelashes fuller. Never irritated my eyes like mist mascaras.  Definitely  will buy this agai

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received  ILIA Fullest Mascara from Pinchme to try and review. I found this mascara to be wet and clumpy. It really weigh down and straightened out my lashes. After a couple hours of wear it looked like it was wearing off. Very strange formula. The brush was I think partly to blame. It seemed to distribute the product unevenly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: ILIA full volumizing mascara makes my short lashes longer and thicker. The brush makes application so easy for both top and bottom lashes. It's a buildable formula that lasts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample from PincheMe of the Ilia Fullest volume mascara. I found this to be an awesome product that provides at least 3 times the volume in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually like this mascara it makes my eyelashes look full

reviews.review_title: Great clean mascara that volumizes perfectly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the applicator & how it fluffed lashes perfectly to look more full. Doesn't irritate eyes. Clean beauty product. Long lasting!  *I received a sample from pinchme but review is my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample from PinchMe in exchange for my review and I have to say that I really like this mascara. It's not flaking like most of the mascara I've used in the past has, so I will definitely be buying this in the future.

reviews.review_title: Not great... but somewhat usable if you have to.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan of this mascara. I found it unpredictable on application. First coat might look like hardly anything on my lashes. Second coat it gets really thick. Tends to melt and smear more than other mascaras I use. And I just don't like the way it looks on my eyes. Also for the price range I find the packaging rather cheap. Just light weight plastic and a light color that gets dirty easily. Is it unusable? No, but I don't want to reach for it if I have way better mascaras and some that are actually way cheaper than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin, short lashes. The Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara is great at making my lashes longer even with just one layer. They also make my lashes appear fuller. There has been no flaking or smearing either. If not careful it did clump a little for me a couple times. But I love that it's a CLEAN mascara and cruelty free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a really nice subtle, everyday no makeup mascara. Having said that, I don't love it because I prefer a more dramatic look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this volumizing mascara it separates my lashes and gives the volume lasts all day easy to remove

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using ILIA's Fullest Volumizing Mascara for over a month now. I'm completely obsessed!! I have very plain eyelashes, so I expect a lot of the mascaras I use. Many that I've tried in the past don't make the cut. I had tried other ILIA products that I love, but never mascara. So I was very excited to try this Volumizing Mascara by ILIA. I'm honestly amazed at how much I love this mascara! It makes my lashes look long, dark, thick, and beautiful. Plus, it's clean and fragrance free. I absolutely love the unique shape of the wand; it really fans out and fills in my lashes. I will say, the first time I used it I over applied and didn't give it enough time to dry and so it smudged. But, now that I've gotten the hang of it, it never smudges or flakes. It's my absolute favorite mascara that I've ever owned; and I currently own six different brands of mascara! Also, it comes off with micellar water really well without damaging my lashes. I highly, highly recommend this mascara for anyone that wants beautiful, thick eyelashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad I was introduced to ILIA products! I love the ingredients in this clean, nourishing mascara, it is lightweight with no clumps, looks great & is good for my lash health!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not familiar with this brand of mascara. I receive a sample of it. After few applications I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While I can honestly say that I was a little skeptical of the brush shape of this mascara, I am definitely sold after giving it a try! No clumping, no smudging, and it came off easily with my makeup remover, allowing me to avoid having to scrub hard. Best part though is how it gave SO much volume to my lashes..They really POPPED!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice mascara -- it has a natural finish that adds a little drama to your everyday look. I really like the brush!! I deducted 1 star because it smudges quite easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used the mascara over the past 10 days and pleased with its performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara as a sample and I'm so glad I did! It really looks natural but also adds subtle volume and length. It does not feel clumpy or heavy. For most days, it stays put. I have tried wearing to golf in hot weather and experienced some smudging. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this to try from @pinchme and I absolutely love it! It's the best mascara that I've ever tried. Makes my so short eyelashes look actually long and full. Just buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the first mascara I have ever used that really does deliver on the volume it promises. First, the brush has a unique and funky design that really works great, it makes it super easy to start at the bottom of the lashes and work it up to the top. (I use the shimmy method...if you know, you know). Second, it has a lovely, rich, dark black color. Lastly, it really does volumize. I don't know how but it makes each lash more defined and all of them as a whole appear fuller. It gives my eyes just the right amount of pop. No weird smells, lasts a long time, no flaking. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara to try and leave a review.  I really do like the mascara.  I love the brush and the way it spreads out my thin lashes.  I'm gonna purchase this in the black brown color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is great. I love mascara that is not  wet  as I call it and weighs my lashes down. This mascara keeps my lashes curled ( after I curl of course) and stays curled till I take it off. Comes off easy also.

reviews.review_title: A little clumpy, but my favorite mascara!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Although a little clumpy, this is my favorite mascara ever!! One swipe and instant volume. I also love the Ilia brand and how it is clean beauty so it feels safe to use. I took off a star for the clumping, but it does get 5 stars when compared to other brands. Enjoy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pinch me sent this to me and I am thrilled that they did, I love this mascara!! It makes my lashes look so good without clumping and I'm loving that. I am quickly becoming an Ilia junkie.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving this as a sample I can say that I am loving it.  Doesn't clump and makes my lashes look great.

reviews.review_title: Glad I tried this; found a new favorite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm active and enjoy swimming and other water sports in the summer time. Therefore, I'm always looking for a mascara that has staying power since I need definition on otherwise pale blonde lashes.  This mascara stays all day without any noticeable smudging. And I'm able to comb and separate lashes for a natural effect without clumping after applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this mascara. It add length and volume with as little as one coat. I love the big brush too. It get every lash! HIghly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara as a sample through pinch me and I'm glad I did, it's the best mascara I've ever used, it makes my lashes look fuller and no clumps, dries fast too. I love it!!

reviews.review_title: This is  so  far it's was  a  good  mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ilia is one of my favorite natural brands and I love this mascara. It doesn't irritate my eyes at all!
