reviews.review_text: i did receive this product for free. this is my second trying ilia mascara. i got a sample size as a birthday reward last year. i love this mascara. it gives your lashes volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this mascara. It doesn't smudge on me, and it makes my lashes look think and full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this mascara is a clean formula with skincare ingredients. It has arginine to support stronger, healthier looking lashes, provitamin B5 to nourish to promote thicker looking lashes, and has a weightless wax blend to add full, flexible body without the weight. I also really like the brush because it is easy to use, gives a lot of volume, and makes it easy to coat every lash. It is starting to get hot and humid where I live and this mascara stays on throughout the day. It doesn't smudge or flake, which can be hard to find, especially in the summer here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a nice mascara. I've tried several and no luck. I really like the brush. I also like that it's not clumpy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The mascara does make your lashes look Good but it clumps after several uses, which may be true of several mascaras. However it made my eyes itch like crazy. I will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Ilia mascara. Application was easy and I love the mascara. My daughter wants to use it too. It lengthen my eyelashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A Sephora employee recommended this after I asked the difference between this and regular Ilia which I normally use.  I should have just stuck with regular Ilia because this vomulizing mascara is too clumpy.  The brush is too big to use on lower lashes as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara and the ingredients. I don't usually wear mascara but have been looking more into weeeinb my natural lashes and this was perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this since 6 months ago, and i love it. i dont care about the other people opinions with this mascara it works so good on my lashesu2757ufe0fud83dude3c

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Pinch Me in exchange for my honest review . i love this mascara the wand feels great in my hand and i love the brush it made my lashes look full with out the clumping . it took 2 passes to get my lashes looking how i like was a little flaking but not to bad its even been holding up great in the heat which is the real test for me because ill be looking like a racoon in no time ill def be buying once this tube runs out

reviews.review_title: Not bad, but not my favorite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara comes with a wand shape I haven't used before. So, it's taking a while to get accustomed to that. The first time or two I used this mascara, I had a really hard time getting it on my lashes. I thought that it must be dried up, but it started working better. I still have to work to get full coverage, but the mascara seems pretty nice once on. I received a sample of this mascara from @pinchme in exchange for a honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall the closest to my ideal: easy application, I love the wand shape that makes it easy to get lift & length & definition quickly- holds up well to constant mom ing on the go - no raccoon sweating at the end of the day but does flake a small bit which is why it's a 4 out of 5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara, does not clump up and very buildable you can lay it up and it would not clump or flake. I have very thin lashes and this give my lash the full volume that it needs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample from pinchme in return for my honest review. This mascara was not my favorite. It requires multiple swipes to get the color I need and because of that I get clumps and it also doesn't seem to last. I love ilia products but this one just isn't for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample for my honest review. I love the shape of the wand on this mascara. It works amazing at separating and coating every lash. Excellent lift and volume. It wears all day without smudging or budging. No flaking. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this mascara to try out and I was really impressed! It is very volumizing without being clumpy at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely this is a good opciu00f3n if you are looking for a dramatic volume in your lashes. Sadly it doesn't fully work on my lashes, I have a really straight lashes and after of a few minutes they started to falling down.

reviews.review_title: Nice clean mascara for a natural look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this clean mascara in exchange for an honest review. I think this mascara is for someone who wants a natural lash look. It is buildable but didn't give the dramatic effect I was looking for. It softly defined my lashes with no fallout. I do love that it is clean and cruelty free. I would purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review and ILIA has really impressed me with this product! The Fullest Volumizing Mascara provides fabulous, buildable length and dramatic volume. But what I really loved is no eye irritation, none of my lashes falling out, and no flaking! It also came off easily at the end of my day with no extra effort..Just perfect!

reviews.review_title: My lashes have never looked better with this Masca
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Mascara was FREE from @Pinchme for an Honest Review! Love this Mascara! My eye lashes look amazing when I wear this! My lashes No smudge, flakes at all! I will definitely purchase this!

reviews.review_title: Great formula-wand a little too big

reviews.review_text: I received a sample of ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara from PINCHme to try. I love the formula. It builds easily without creating large chunks. I just wish the tip of the wand was smaller. It is difficult to get into the corners of my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the Ilia fullest voluming mascara. I found the unique applicator brush to be so effective. My lashes looked full and beautiful.

reviews.review_title: Definitely a good Mascara to try.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving my free sample of ILIA FULLEST  VOLUMIZING MASCARA from PINCHme. I have to say it goes on nicely, has a easy to use, nice wand to apply. And makes my lashing look fuller and bold. It's a good Mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this mascara several times I have found a new favorite! It applies easily and makes my eye lashes look bold and full! Stays on without smudging all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from pinchme.  I really liked how this applies and looked on my lashes.

reviews.review_title: A good mascara for building layers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have liked the other ILIA products that I have used so I was excited to get to try the Fullest Volumizing Mascara.  I liked the shape of the wand and the product was not flaky to apply. I found that using the mascara was best as a building layer. I used a lash primer, the ILIA mascara and then another mascara to finish out the look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion from Pinchme. This mascara has a stiff hourglass wand and a rather dry formula. While it looks nice upon initial application it quickly starts to flake and smudge under my eyes. Nice for short term looks but wouldn't recommend for long wear or hot weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's OK.  Best clean mascara I've used. To me, and I've seen other reviews mention this, it goes on a little wet and feels kind of heavy.  Some complain about the product being too dry or thick. Actually, I wish this would thicken a bit.  It darkens my lashes, but doesn't really give a bold volumized effect.  If you like a more natural look and not a bold I'm wearing mascara look, then this is probably good.  I tend to like the more dramatic look, however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item free for my honest review. It does a pretty good adding volume and length to my lashes. I would say it doesn't perform better than my go-to mascara which has more drama but works for an everyday look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really do not like this mascara. It bleeds onto my under eye throughout the day (yes I use a setting powder)  making it look like I have dark circles & it's impossible to get it all off when I wash my face. It makes your lashes look good, but it's not worth the hassle ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the Ilia Fullest Volumizing black mascara. It make my lashes look thicker. No issues with flaking or clumping! I like the shape of the wand too. I received this for my honest feedback from Pinchme and Ilia.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It makes my lashes looks like extensions. I get alot of compliments when I use this.

reviews.review_title: LOVE LOVE LOVE Ilia fullest volumizing mascara!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful mascara not tested on animals always has my love! But that's not all that makes this a great product. The packaging is amazing! Love the simple and classy design and how fat the tube is! The wand is perfect for applications and the formula is fabulous! Blackest of blacks I'm a keeper for life! Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara. Beautiful packaging. I love that it is not tested on animals. Provides such a beautiful natural but thick look. Best of all it doesn't flake and so easy to take off. Doesn't smudge and comes off very easily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara! Goes on smooth with no clumps and lasts for hours! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this mascara I can say that it impress me a lot, is really easy to apply and it doesn't flake it does not weight my eyelashes down, and they look longer and I don't need to curle them before applying it. It is 100% recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's a nice strong mascara. It went on really thick though, my lashes felt heavy. And- it started to smudge and it wasn't even really hot outside. I'm a little disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara to try for free in exchange for my honest review. I love it! The brush makes it easy to apply and gives my lashes volume and length. It does not smudge and stays on all day - even in humid weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely the best clean mascara I've tried! It's gentle, but still has a great dark black color, and goes on smooth (no clumping, no flaking). I think one coat provides significant difference. I wish it gave me just a little bit more volume/thickness, otherwise this is a near-perfect formula!  I received a full size tube from PinchMe in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly the best mascara I've ever used. I consistently get compliments for this mascara because it gives my lashes the illusion of falsies. The wand allows for even coating throughout your lashes and if you're thinking of buying, do it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my go to brand. But the last tube I bought appeared to already be dried out. So I assumed I had a bad one so I went to exchange it. I asked if we could make sure it was ok. We trird 3 different tubes and they were all the same. So sad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this black mascara.   It is thick going on, and 1 coat is enough to make my lashes look thicker.  I didn't know have issues with running or clumping, so overall a win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great mascara-but hear me out. Some mascaras need time to u201cthickenu201d or sit awhile before you use them. They are too wet. That's this ones one's only issue. I have had a travel size and after a couple weeks it was perfect.   It's a great formula, with a primer it lasts about 8 hours before any issues arise (flaking is the main one). The wand is amazing. Just give it a little time. It's a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara works well enough. It is a clean formula. It made my lashes look fuller. I wasn't in love with the brush. It's a bit difficult to work with and not get mascara on my lid. I also noticed after a few hours it was starting to transfer to my lower lid. It's good for a clean version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product for free from Pinchme and Ilia in exchange for my honest opinion.* The Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara is an ok mascara, but I wouldn't call it my favorite. While it does darken my lashes and make them more noticeable, I don't feel that it supplies a more voluminous or longer look than any other product. The tube and packaging are quite modern and clean looking. The tube is easy to hold and I was able to apply to my upper and lower lashes easily.  As far as coverage on my lashes, I would say it looks natural. I do find that after wearing it for a few hours it tends to smudge and leave marks under my eyes, so thats why I'm giving it 3 stars. I've had the opportunity to try out other Ilia products and I really like them; this one was sadly a bit of a let-down for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is fantastic. It provides the volume I need without the flaking!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: High Volume Mascara! I received Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara for free from #PINCHme in exchange for my honest review. It is easy to apply and makes my eye lashes look longer, more voluminous, and more noticeable. I only needed to use one or two layers and I did not get clumpy eyelashes. I really liked it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is wonderful. It doesn't clump and lasts all day, doesn't flake off. Makes my lashes look fuller and longer. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love Ilia products. This mascara made my lashes appear longer and fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from PinchMe in exchange for my honest opinion. I love this mascara! It has no scent like other mascaras that I have tried before and it is volumizing while separating my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My teen daughter liked  this mascara, but did not really like the shape of the wand.  It made her lashes long and full, however, she felt the wand made the application a little uneven

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was expecting a little more after using Ilias other mascara. Was hard to get the volume I wanted. Difficult to build

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of the Ilia fullest Volumizing Mascara from PinchMe. I absolutely love this mascara and definitely recommend it. It applies easily, lasts all day without flaking, and removes easily with micellar water at the end of the day. It separates and lifts my lashes while adding the perfect amount of color. I typically use essence or covergirl mascara and like my lashes to look enhanced yet natural.  When it is time to repurchase mascara, I would definitely buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much! It is light, does not weight my lashes so much and what is most important, it dries fast and it is so easy to apply! It makes my lashes look fuller and longer in an instant. I highly recommend it. My new favorite every day mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara in Classic Black and loved the shape of the wand. It made it super easy to apply the mascara, getting the smallest lashes in the corners as well as on the bottom. I noticed added length and volume throughout all of my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast, I've tried my fair share of mascaras. But let me tell you, the ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara is a game-changer! From the moment I swiped it on, I knew I had found my new lash BFF.  The formula is lightweight and glides on effortlessly without feeling heavy or clumpy. One coat gives a natural look, but two coats? Oh, honey! That's where the magic happens. My lashes go from u201cmehu201d to u201cwowza!u201d in seconds. And the best part? No clumps, no spider legsu2014just beautifully separated, defined lashes.  But let's talk results. My lashes practically touch my eyebrows (okay, maybe not that extreme, but you get the idea). The volumizing effect is unreal! And the length? I've got the kind of lashes that usually play hide-and-seek, but ILIA coaxed them out of hiding. They're longer, fluttery, and oh-so-flirty.  Worried about smudging? Fear not! This mascara doesn't flake or smudge. I've worn it from morning meetings to late-night karaoke sessions, and my lashes stayed put. Plus, it's a breeze to removeu2014no tugging, no raccoon eyes.  In summary, the ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara is a must-try for anyone who wants va-va-voom lashes without sacrificing clean beauty. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the easy application of this mascara, great with a few coats and no clumping. My lashes appeared fuller with this mascara. Unfortunately, it did smudge under my eyes some.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product. I've loved this mascara for years and have never understood why their other mascara is more popular. This really lifts and lengthens and lasts all day. 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *ILIA sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program.*  This mascara is transfer proof, especially upon first application! I intentionally tried squeezing my eyes shut, and I still didn't see transfer. I think this means it's also smudge proof, but you can judge for yourself based on my description. I definitely saw increased volume upon application. I tend to apply by wiggling root to tip and going over the lashes 2-3 times per application. Idk if that means I do 2 applications or 4-6 applications (?), but I tend to curl, swipe, brush, swipe, brush (I use a metal eyelash brush). I genuinely love the results so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara is my favorite mascara. I've used it for a few weeks and I love it. It finishes my makeup look so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara, for free from PinchMe, Sephora, and Ilia, in exchange for testing and review purposes. This is the first time I have ever used an Ilia mascara product before, and can say I am a fan. This product goes on effortlessly, is long lasting, and gives the perfect amount of fullness to your lashes. The application wand is perfectly designed to get even the shortest of lashes. This is a product I would purchase again in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara has Arginine & Provitamin B5 to help give you stronger & healthier looking lashes. Plus,it is a clean mascara that is safe for sensitive eyes.I am not a fan of the violin shaped applicator.Even when I removed excess product from the wand I would still end up with too much clumping and all of my lashes were not evenly coated. You can certainly see that your lashes are coated.It does coat lashes well and it is builadable.However, even when I had no eye cream or makeup on the mascara was flaking and smudging under my eyes within a short window of time. For me,I think this just needs a tweak in the formula and a different wand.Preferably,a curved or micro wand applicator. Thank you PINCHme & Ilia. I received the Fullest Volumizing Mascara in the  full-size product complimentary from PINCHme & Ilia in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm such a hypocrite when it comes to mascaras. It's rare I find one I love and this one is amazing. Since using it I've gotten complements on how full and long my lashes look and I never have!

reviews.review_title: Great Mascara, But Wand it Large for my small eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is amazing. It is a great formula and gives volume. The only issue I have is that the wand is too large for my eyes. I can't use the thicker part of the wand (and I would LOVE to) because it would smear mascara on my eyes. So it is difficult to apply and use the whole length of the wand. So if you have smaller eyes, this might not be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a free Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara from pinchme.com. Great mascara. Nice volume. Didn't work as well on my lashes but that's ok. Highly Recommend tho because it did bring out my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara does make my lashes look fuller.   I have used the mascara for a couple of weeks and I really am pleased with it.   I have thin sparse lashes since hitting my 50s and my mascara I have used for years just could not give the full look I was wanting.  The brush on the Ilia mascara does a really good job at depositing the mascara without clumping.  It also still gives separation!  The only reason I gave the mascara 4 stars instead of 5 is because it does not add any length.   I realize it doesn't claim to but I still prefer  lengthening too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara has made a noticeable difference in the way my lashes look. They appear darker, longer and thicker. I did expect a little bit more from the volumizing mascara to make them look even fuller. I haven't had any issues with any flaking or smudging with the mascara. It lasts throughout the day and is easy to remove at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the volume and length this mascara provided.  long wearing and easy to remove.  Not sure I'd pay $28 for it, however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this mascara. I have been happy with the application and overall result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I had returned this. The brush is too big. Despite applying properly it gets all over my eyelids. At the end of the day you can't really even tell I have mascara on and my eyelids are all smudged. It looks like yesterday's mascara I forgot to wash off. Hate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara for free from PINCHme in exchange for my honest review. This mascara is made of ingredients that you can be worry free about. This brand really values its clean reputation. It's easy to apply and does create a more voluminous look of my lashes. The brush really helps separate my lashes and make them more noticeable. I applied a couple layers and had no clumpy lashes! I was definitely pleased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample from PinchMe to give this product a shot and I was very satisfied. Great look, with a great feel and not too terribly hard to remove. I certainly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!! It doesn't flake, which is HUGE and it goes on your eyelashes very smoothly. You'll probably want to do a couple layers though. I love the spoolie on the end. The packaging is so slick and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara in exchange for my honest opinion. The ILIA Volumizing Mascara is so good for that naturally enhanced look. I love that the formula is not clumpy. I enjoy that it doesn't feel heavy/ weighted on my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I received this mascara in exchange for my honest opinion and I love Ilia products, so I was thrilled. This mascara somewhat gives my lashes a bit more length and volume, but I've had better results with other brands. The things that I like are the fact that this brand is a u201ccleanu201d brand which is something I'm always looking for. I also liked the shape of the wand and the ease of removing the mascara at the end of the day. I would consider purchasing this product if the price was considerably lower and if they worked on their formula a little to make it better. Ilia is a great makeup brand and I am a regular user of their other products, but will stick with another brand until they come up with another formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from PinchMe in exchange for my honest review. This is a pretty good mascara for those who just want length and separation. The brush reminds me of the Lash Paradise by L'Oreal, it is big enough to get every single lash coated. The formula is kind of thin and doesn't give that thickness and pigment right away. The good thing is this mascara can be built up with a couple coats. Removal is fairly easy (I use micellar water) and it stays nicely throughout the day. Personally this is a great mascara to layer. I use it as my base to coat every lash and separate them, then go in with another to thicken and make more dramatic.

reviews.review_title: Will be buying from now on
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara as a free sample. I waited to review this product until I wore it for a couple of days. I've never worn a clean mascara before and I can honestly say that I don't think I'll be buying anything but this from now on. It's easy to apply, doesn't flake, clump or leave me with raccoon eyes halfway through the day. And it comes off so nicely with just face wash and water. Doesn't leave a residue at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from PinchMe for my review. I like the color and pigmentation of the mascara. I found it to be volumizing as advertised. You can't do more than 2-3 coats without it starting to clump. So if you like to layer up, 2-3 is really the max. At 2 you get good volume and length. It doesn't wash well with just warm water and soap, a makeup remover is needed. I liked the brush. I was able to get good coverage and it stayed on without any issues for the entire day. Overall I like it and would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I quite like this mascara. Bold black pigment without lots of lash clumping. I tend to stay more on the natural looking side which is very achievable with this mascara. You can also use multiple coats for a more dramatic look if desired. It does start to smudge a bit under my eyes after 5-6 hours but not horribly so. Easy to wash off at the end of the day (not scrubbing needed) with zero eye irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: One of the best mascaras I've used

I used 2 coats the first coat didn't look like much but when I hit it with the second coat it was like my eyelashes said hi .. I liked that it was thinner product so it wasn't heavy or weighing on my eyelashes. It didn't flake or clump up they had nice separation and wash off was easy . I didn't have to scrub and rub or use 3 different products just to remove my mascara.. I like how the end of the wand was a little smaller to get those little lashe in the corners and not get it all over my eye lids . This was a great surprise and I absolutely loved this product will definitely get this one when I run out.

reviews.review_text: As a self-proclaimed mascara lover, I've tried several formulas promising to deliver length, volume, and drama to my lashes. However, few have impressed me as much as this brand. I like how easy it is to build up and customize my look, whether I am aiming for natural or full glam. It has an incredible performance, and the innovative brush is an hourglass shape perfect for lifting and volumizing. Therefore, I must brag about the staying poweru2026no flaking, smudging, clumps, fluffy, wide-eye lashes that last all day.

I liked how well it lengthened and added volume to my lashes . I love that ilia is a clean product so there are no worries on what you're putting on . It lasted all day and didn't flake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from Pinch Me.  This mascara is soooooo good, it makes my sparse lashes look so full and pretty.  I usually have a hard time finding a mascara that gives me the full look that I want, but this product does.  The formula is not thick and clumpy.  I don't like thick or clumpy mascara because it doesn't give me that separated and full looking lashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara was really great. Left my lashes looking so full and long. Highly recommend!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is so good, it makes my sparse lashes look so full and pretty.  I usually have a hard time finding a mascara that gives me the full look that I want, but this product does. I received this product to review from Pinchme, and I'm in love. The formula is not thick and clumpy, which I hate, I definitely recommend this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample from PinchMe for my honest review. I like the ingredients to help lashes and it doesn't smudge. I just didn't get that dramatic effect that I was going for. I know it said buildable volume but after many swipes, I didn't get where I wanted and it's sad that some of my other mascara at half the price do that. But credit to ilia for making it last and at least making my lashes look healthy in a natural way. If you are going for a natural look that this is it. You can see my before and after pics to see that at least it made the lashes a bit darker

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product from ILIA I never owned a mascara from ILIA before and I fell in love it's truly beautiful , truly recommend to anyone to try . Thank you .

reviews.review_title: great for a more natural look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a complimentary sample. the wand was hourglass shape. it did not clump or fall off. it does go on very well it took me about two to three times to get the length. it did not give a bold look like a normally do. it is great for a natural look. very easy to wash off and did not irate my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find that this mascara is suitable for a more natural look. It can offer some length and volume but not enough for a more bolder eye look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is lightweight and it didn't clump! I love the wand applicator and my lashes look fuller and defined after applying. Great mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara from PinchMe complimentary an  exchange for my honest opinion. This is a great mascara, i have medium length super curly lasher and i do not wear fake lashes, i prefer to wear my natural lashes & the bristles on this brush ( i was nervous because the brush is pretty big ) but it helps separates my lashes, it does not clump or flake, my lashes looks define and they look so pretty and natural, its pretty buildable, i am so impressed with this mascara and would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara. Easy to apply, looks great, and easy to remove....would buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from PINCHme & HAPPYPINCHer in exchange for my honest opinion. I absolutely love the ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara it's worked wonders for my natural lashes, I don't do fakes so this is awesome the Violin Shaped brush separates the lashes & helps define them wow .This Mascara is also easy to remove , and a Clean product, but I've noticed my lashes are fuller looking, healthier and this Mascara doesn't Clump & Doesn't Smudge, It's Buildable- I love that ,it's also weightless & Opthalmologist Tested and has Skincare in it WIN WIN - MY Eyes look more Intense & More Defined. --- I would Highly Recommend This To Everyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received Ilia's Fullest Volumizing Mascara complimentary from PINCHme for my honest opinion, and I like this mascara. With age, my lashes have become sparse, with no volume, and this mascara helped my eyes look better. I don't experience any clumping, or flaking, and it washes off without any scrubbing. Every Ilia beauty product I have, I love, it's a great beauty brand. The violin shaped brush, helps my lashes stick out, usually you can't see my lashes, I recommend this mascara, no smudging, so it doesn't look like I have black eyes. Two thumbs up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a very lightweight mascara . Very natural looking, separated my lashes nicely ! It didn't clump on me . I can't wait to keep using it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this product in exchange for my honest review. The brush on this mascara was awesome and made applying it to my straight lashes easy. It definitely provided volume and even helped fan them out a bit. It didn't clump either, which can sometimes be an issue for me. The product did not flake or smudge throughout my day. I would purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review from pinchme.com.  This is a really good mascara. Non-clumping on my lashes and gives extreme volume. I love ILIA products because they are beneficial for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just recently started using the Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara. So far I'm really liking this product. I'm still getting used to the shape of the wand, but I like the volume of bristles on the brush. I swiped quite a few times to build the volume up. It doesn't flake or make my lashes clump together. And it's also easy to remove at the end of the day. I'm happy with the length, volume, and color it's giving my lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent and easy to apply! What a difference! Creamy, doesn't have a harsh fragrance,  doesn't flake off, easily buildable and it lengthens so beautifully!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually love this mascara, and the only reason I'm giving it a 4 star instead of 5 is the name. It does not give me the fullest, most max volume. Instead, it lengthens and darkens my lashes, making them look enhanced, not over the top. I think it's the perfect mascara for daily use- there's absolutely no clumping or flaking, just darker, longer lashes, and who wouldn't want that?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many mascaras only to be left with red itchy eyes. I tried this one and am so happy I did. I can use it without irritation. Wonderful mascara. Gives full, long lashes. Washes off easily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Personally I didn't like this Mascara, the main purpose of using mascara is to create volume, and lengthening so that the eye looks bigger but with this mascara I don't get any of that also I can't keep my eyelashes curl. The formula feels lightweight, easy to remove.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The ILIA fullest volumizing Mascara did add volume to my short lashes. I like that the mascara is dark enough to see a difference in my lashes. Not a lot of product comes off of the hourglass brush. So you won't get clumps in your lashes. I felt like I had to be careful applying the mascara because the brush is quite large. In all I did enjoy the mascara. I received this product from PINCHme in exchange for my honest review and opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying Ilia mascara and love the wand shape! The brush coats my outermost  lashes beautifully. I used two coats, but as you know, mascara doesn't ast like mascara until after two coats. I liked the application, but there was a crazy amount of smudging. I'd rather not be checking a mirror for moving mascara. I think this would be best with a primer applied first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally loved this product it works well for my long lashes and it doesn't irritate the eye. So far (I have teary  eyes) the mascara doesn't run while I sweat or cry but I haven't tested it like that yet to say fully. I like that's buildable and doesn't feel heavy on the lashes. I do wish the brush was a different type more curved. But I like it I like the added benefits and it works well on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample in exchange for an honest review and I like it. It doesn't clump my lashes when applied. It gives my lashes a natural look, while also adding volume.  I like how the end is hourglass shape.  It helps apply easier on both bottom & top lashes & get into corners of my eyes.  I would recommend.  I also love that it is clean and truly weightless. I often find I am double checking that I applied because my lashes fell so light after other brands/ products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sparse eyelashes so I'm always looking for ways to make my lashes look fuller and longer.   I was excited to try a free sample of ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara from PINCHme. I noticed an instant change in my lashes with just one layer of mascara.  It goes on easy and I think the hourglass shaped wand helps keep it clump free. I love the way it makes my lashes look and makes my eyes pop.  I'll definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many mascaras over my u201cmakeup lifetimeu201d. Some have been good while others didn't even make the cut.  When I tried this mascara I had just removed eyelash extensions. I was worried my lashes would look terrible (which would have been awful because mascara makes my look).    This mascara surprised me by making my lashes look full, defined, and even. The brush has an interesting shape, but that may have been what helped define my lashes.   I highly recommend this mascara (I rarely give this much positive kudos to a mascara).  It went on well. I did apply multiple coats, but I always do this with mascara. There was absolutely no clumping and the application wand made it easy. I wore this mascara for over 10 hours with no flaking, running, or smudging.   I received this product to try/test I exchange for my honest review. @pinchme, #happypincher, @ilia

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from Pinchme in exchange for a review.  I was a little skeptical of my technique using the hourglass brush, but found it was very effective at giving me a clean application to my pages that left them looking fuller. My lashes didn't count even after a second coat and I didn't have any smudges or irritation from it throughout the day. Easy to apply and easy to take off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Omg!!!! This stuff is so awesome!!!! My lashes look gorgeous. Lots of volume length and curl. There was no flaking clumping or smudging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample from Pinch me.com. Good mascara that doesn't clump up and the bush shape works well for me. The color works well for my light skin brown hair.

reviews.review_title: Really nice lengthening and defining mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a hard person to please when it concerns mascara and this one is a fantastic surprise. It gives such great length and volume and is NOT messy, too thick nor does it smear. I typically do not like the hourglass brush but this one was nice as it doesn't deposit too much product and does a great job of separating and defining the lashes. I highly recommend this product. I did receive this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing length that feels natural against my lashes. I like that it doesn't get clumpy or flaky and stays on throughout the day without issues or irritation. Great volume and a favorite mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara in exchange for a review. I normally wear waterproof mascara because I have seasonal allergies so with this traditional mascara, I just have to be careful not to touch my eyes and cause it to smudge. First of all, I love the brush. The wider ends help get those pesky little corner lashes coated. I also exclusively wear black mascara so the color is perfect for me. This formula is lightweight and buildable, and stays flexible and soft all day. I only put on one coat for the included photo, but two coats is probably ideal for that full effect. It is a little clumpy so I have to pick the clumps out once I let it dry for a bit. I've only used it for a few days so I can't vouch for any benefits of the added arginine and vitamin B5 in the product. Overall, it's a nice mascara and I'd like to try a waterproof version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Ilia fullest volumizing mascara in a pinch me box in exchange for my honest review.  My sixteen year old daughter both tried this product.  I didn't care for it,  but she said it's her new favorite mascara.  It made my eye lashes look thicker,  but not longer.  I prefer a lengthening mascara for myself.  However my daughter's eye lashes looked both thicker and longer after using it.  She said that you need to curl your eyelashes before using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It is even better knowing it has clean ingredients. It does take a little longer to wash off, but it gives my lash a good lift and doesn't smear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Ilia Fullest Volumizing mascara went on easily and made a dramatic difference in my lashes. My lashes looked longer and fuller. It was weightless and my lashes were soft and flexible. The mascara stayed on comfortably all day without flaking or smudging. I found a new mascara!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love clean beauty products and the Ilia brand is a favorite of mine. This mascara adds the right amount of volume and definition to my lashes without any irritation or smudging. The arginine and provitamin b5 fortify and condition for stronger and fuller looking lashes. I really like the packaging design and the wand. This mascara is good for my lashes and the planet. It's a winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the mascara and the clean ingredients. I'd say it's decent and feels good on my lashes. I didn't use an eyelash curler just to truly test the mascara out. I do have straight lashes and this mascara gave me a little volume. I went in with one coat and it was smooth but it didn't give me the volume and curl I wanted. I went in with another coat and I noticed it started to flake, however, I love that it separated my lashes instead of clumping. Perhaps if I go in with an eyelash curler it'll help enhance the product. Overall, I do like and this may be my new go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample bottle of Ilia Mascara in exchange for my honest review. I wasn't overly impressed. It was a little messy and clumpy. It's best to use a very small amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand and and this mascara. It's got an hourglass shaped wand with combs that glide beautifully through the lashes. After only one coat it gave amazing curl and lift. With two coats it looks perfect. There was no clumping or flaking. This mascara is perfection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara makes my lashes look fuller.  I like that the formula is buildable but does not smudge or flake.  It also doesn't irritate my eyes.  I also like that they have updated the tube to help reduce carbon emissions and waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like Ilia's mascaras. They don't flake and irritate my eyes and the look is natural. Now the Fullest Volumizing with it's hourglass wand ups the ante. It makes my lashes appear so lush and full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item free from PinchMe. While I do like the brand and the clean ingredients, I found the brush to be awkward (too wide on the top/bottom perhaps), and I thought the coverage was alright. I didn't love the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!! It's a light weight container and the wand is hour glass. It's definitely a volumizing mascara. I recommend it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled to find a mascara that doesn't smudge and smear. I have dry eyes and use eyedropu2018s frequently during the day. However, this mascara did not smudge under my eyes, even after using eyedrops. It also looks very natural when you use it on your lashes. This is a winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ilia products are always made so well and I love that they are clean, so I can feel good about using them, especially around my eyes. This mascara is so good. It is a rich black color and lifts and separates my lashes so well. It doesn't smudge or transfer to my under-eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great mascara. It is really easy to apply and does not clump or smudge. I even exercised with it and it stayed in place. It also separates lashes really well. I was fortunate to receive this as a free sample from PinchMe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara does what it's supposed to do and it looks fabulous on. It washes away easily at the end of the day as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm loving this mascara! I only need one coat to lengthen and volumize my lashes. I wore it all day (10+ hours) with no flaking or smudging. I also fell asleep with it on and it still looked great when I woke up. Highly recommend! #happypincher @PINCHme.com

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! It works great. It hydrates really well and very pretty. It provides a fuller look but doesn't make them look long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Love the way this mascara feels. Lasts a long time without needing to be applied. Hourglass bush ud83dude0d

reviews.review_title: One of the better mascaras I've tried
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this mascara from Pinchme and I'm pretty impressed. It took me a while to get used to the brush but it goes on without clumping and separates my lashes nicely. It does smudge a bit under my eyes at the end of the day but doesn't flake and wears well. I'm not sure I'd replace my Maybelline Sky High mascara with it but it's a close second.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I rec'd a sample from @Pinchme for an honest review. I was a bit disappointed in the volume this mascara gave to my lashes. After several applications I got my lashes to the point I was happy with but it took more than I'm use to using. Overall this mascara is perfect for a clean natural look to your lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great mascara. Great volume. No flaking or smudging. Slightly clumpy. Definitely my go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This volumizing mascara really makes my lashes look fuller and soft. This mascara does not dry crunchy like others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's easy to use I like how it has a smaller end then forms bigger so you can get every lash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a week and I really like it. It doesn't clump and builds easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara my lashes look so full and beautiful. I will always wear this mascara my lashes are more healthy after using this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara has a bristle brush and it works well for my lashes. The brush pulls clean and doesn't have excess product load on the bristles, which helps me achieve a clump free look. It's not a very wet formula so I like to build with at 2-3 layers to get my desired effect. It wears well with no transfer or flaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara it works so easily and Makes them look amazing. The brush covers every strand, very little smudging and I enjoy that.

reviews.review_title: I had high expectations which weren't met
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this mascara a couple days ago and was very excited to try it but truly I was a little disappointed. It gives a clean look but doesn't add as much volume as advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is beyond amazing. It is my go to mascara. It is good for every day use as well as going out. It gives you volume and gives you curl it looks natural but amazing. It does not flake and it is not clumpy and it did not affect my sensitive eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the fullest volumizing mascara. It's buildable wich I like. Super rich and black. Definitely noticed some length and definition to my lashes. It does smudge a little bit but not much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from pinchme for my honest review. I love the way my lashes look so full after using this. It made my lashes longer and fuller. Great product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works well to lengthen my lashes and make it look more voluminous. The unique brush shape did take some getting used to.

reviews.review_title: This is by far the best i've ever used!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great Mascara! I really like that it doesn't clump, makes my eyelashes look longer, and is easy to take off.it applies effortlessly and i don't need to apply it a ton of times to get my lashes looking voluminous. love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product exceeded my expectations. Its easy to use and goes on evenly. It doesnt clump or smudge. I love how it lasts all day. Its also easy to remove at the end of the day. I received a free product in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this mascara! Hardly any clumping, great length and volume! This is exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mascara for about a week. I keep trying to give it a chance and I do not like it. it's not wet enough and not very buildable. not crazy about the pigment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receive this mascara as a sample. Fullest Volumizing Mascara Is actually really good. Normally the mascara that i had makes my lashes clump but this one didnt. It was long lasting. My lashes looked good. They look with volume, long and curl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last few weeks I am pleased with it's performance. I have sensitive eyes which sometimes can be bothered with other mascaras, not only did it not irritate my eyes it lasted all day. Super natural it's like my eyelashes but better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I've stopped using my former one. The long lasting color is great there's no clumping or smudging. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Make the most of your lashes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the innovative brush.  It applied the product better than other brushes I've tried.  This mascara made the most of my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lovely mascara from ILIA and honestly I am impressed by this product. I love how clean it is and wasnt lumpy on my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best mascara as it works as well as the best and is non toxic too. Great volume and stays put all day. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received a free sample of ilia fullest volumizing mascara in exchange for my honest review. This mascara is easy to apply and is long lasting. I usually have had problems with clumping with past mascaras ,but this didn't happen with this mascara. I will definitely be buying in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have recently received this product as part of Pinchme. I must say it is a decent mascara for every day use. So far I like the mascara because it is easy to apply and in perfect that I can carry in my bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara in exchange of my honest opinionu2026 Y'all I love it! It's so natural looking on my lashes, doesn't clump up, the brush is amazing! No smudging all over the place for me. It's stayed put during my crazy workouts.. I highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how this mascara gives volume to my eyelashes it does not clump. I like to design of the brush or the applicator making my lashes look good.

reviews.review_title: Wish they would change the brush....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the formula of the mascara.  It does a good job of adding volume, as it claims.  The only thing I don't really like about it is the shape of the brush.  To me, it make it difficult to apply.  I'm trying to get the product on my lashes, but the middle of the brush is indented and then I feel like I'm stabbing myself with the outer part of the brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite thing about this mascara is how smoothly it goes on. I'm just not a spider lash person. It has pretty good wear all day, initially I had a slight bit of transfer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice mascara that goes on smooth and lengthens the eyelashes without clumping. So, I assumed that since I loved it and all of my Ilia products, I would love the Fullest Lash as well... wrong! it was caked on the brush and very clumpy on my lashes. I tried a few times, and it did not get better. Also, the outer lid came off about 2 weeks after I started using it, and I could not get it to snap back on. Needless to say, I was more than unimpressed with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The brush is huge & the size makes it extremely difficult to use. With how massive the brush is, you end up with way too much product on the brush when applying to your lashes, which just causes them to clump up & get stringy. I end up having to scrape off 90% of the product from the brush on the rim of the tube & then I can get some control over my application. I do however prefer this formula over Ilia's Limitless mascara, it's less crumbly & more wear resistant. When I can control the amount of product on the brush, I do find I get nice volume in my lashes, but obviously not much length. I end up layering with my Tower28 MakeWaves mascara to add length, the combo seems to work well. If only they significantly reduced the size of the brush, this could be added into my rotation of mascara... but as it stands, it's a hard pass.

It seems like a heavier formula even when I curled my lashes after a few hours my lashes were weighed. Down and looking very straight out, with no upward curl left. It was transferring to my eyelids and and leaving dark under eyes constantly. I love Ilia's other mascara so much more, I returned this one and bought the lengthening one again for the 5th time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After trying the Ilia lengthening mascara as part of the Sephora birthday gift, I wanted to give this volumizing mascara a try. I liked the lengthening one but was missing volume, so I thought this would be worth trying. I'm blessed with naturally thick and long lashes, so there are very few mascaras that really just don't work for me and this is unfortunately one. My lashes never look as nice as I want them to with this mascara, and there are a few contributing factors. One, this mascara is so messy. The wand is very large, which isn't a particular problem for me, but because this formula is so waxy and takes forever to dry, you will get it on your lid and it will make a giant mess. If you do get this on your lid, your eyeshadow is screwed. It never completely wipes off and leaves black smudges, even when you wait minutes for the mascara to dry. Then, it somehow ends up smudged on my lower lash line even though I don't apply this to my bottom lashes! I did that once and learned quickly that this is absolutely not meant for lower lashes. Lastly, this formula is very heavy, wet and waxy and will ruin any curl on your lashes. Again, lash curl is not usually an issue for me with other mascara's, but no matter how often I re-curl my lashes with this mascara, they can't hold up with the weight of this formula.   I will use up this tube of mascara since it's all that I have, but I really don't recommend this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Mascara itself looked great once I figured out a good technique for applying it. Like others have said, there's so much product on the actual brush/wand, it's hard to not be clumpy. I honestly forgot it was supposed to have a narrow middle in the brush! But the worst thing was that it makes me have raccoon eyes:( I'm fair skinned and blonde hair so it was OBVIOUS when I was at work and ran to the bathroom only to find massive black shadows under my eyes. I think it has a lot of potential but there are definitely some issues with it and I would not buy again until those issues are fixed
