reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the limitless so I figured I'd switch things up and give this one a try. It looks good when I initially put it on but about an hour later I have raccoon eyes every single day. I'm constantly going to fix it at work throughout the day. It's also incredibly difficult to get off. I'll think I finally got it all off at night and wake up with makeup under my eyes again. Definitely switching back to the limitless, this one is more of a hassle than it's worth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to go out to a fancy dinner wearing this mascara, and everyone around me kept looking at me weird, it was only then that I realize that it was snugging everywhere and made me look like I was crying my eyes out, when I wasn't. And I barely put any on, it was one swipe on both top eyelashes, and I didn't put any on at the bottom. I hated this mascara, would not recommend anyone to buy this.
Decided to finally try after seeing rave reviews - it was so thick and clumpy it made my eyelashes look horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to use this since i had used other products from the brand but this stuff will get all over your eyes with the smallest amount of moisture it's actually kind of ridiculous

reviews.review_title: Ilia needs to fix the component
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formula of this mascara is amazing. I'm replacing my make up with clean(er) products as they run out and this mascara was the only one that came close to Diorshow. However... I was testing out the mini version that has an amazing brush. When I purchased the full size version, the brush was not the same at all - the shape and the bristles were different - and the wand comes out with globs of product. You cannot use this without wiping off the excess amount and even then the bristles don't give you that defined fullness I got with the mini. Two stars only for the formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Does not coat well. Makes lashes look thinner than normal.

reviews.review_title: + Nice volume / coverage - large brush and $$
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a lifelong L'Oreal mascara fan, but have been trying to introduce cleaner products into my routine. This mascara is so thick and covers so much that I feel like I almost don't need eyeliner anymore. So the effect is great and I have purchased my second one. I kind of hate how huge the brush is though; iconically because it's so big it's hard to reach all the lashes. There is some flakiness or clumps at the end of the day that pulls out a lash or two sometimes. Also, this is more than $20 more expensive than L'Oreal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the product when I received the mini tube, but I bought 2 of the full size and they are both very clumpy! Very unhappy and will likely return them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is hard to use. It takes a while to dry so you have to be really careful not to let it smudge. The brush is also a little overwhelming... so much product comes off on it so while it's already more wet to begin with you now have to also be careful with how you're applying it because it can get too much on your lashes too fast. It is volumizing I'll give it that, but I like the Milk Kush Mascara better... it has a very similar affect and is easier to work with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this mascara! It's buildable and very deep black. For all those who rated poorly because the mascara smudges or runs, of course it will! It's a natural mascara! The point of the formula is to be better for you and not use all of the nasty chemicals that would make it stay in place!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the brand. But this mascara is a big NO. Takes way too long to dry, uncurls my lash because the formula is so heavy, never really dries down so ends up on my face. DOES NOR layer well at all. After one coat the 2nd coat gets so clump. Safe your money, there is better drugstore mascaras then this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an excellent volumizing marscara. It can be a little clumpy at times but overall a great purchase. I am very impressed with how well it stays put not being a waterproof mascara. It never rubs off on my upper lids either. Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super clumpy and take forever to dry. Only plus to this mascara is that it washes off easily.

reviews.review_title: The wrong Ilia mascara to try
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: awful. I've tried just about every mascara under the sun, and this one is in the running for Worst I've tried. The only kind of volume I got came from the massive chunks that stuck to my lashes and crumbled all over my face. Ilia's lengthening mascara is great, but I'd get your volume somewhere else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love mascara and my regular one/brand over the years began to irritate my eyes. I used to use Av*da mascara years ago and I think they discontinued the formula I used to purchase. My point is that the ILIA lengthening mascara reminds me of that formula. Anyway, I tried the ILIA lengthening formula first and really enjoy that one. It has a rose oil scent and separates/lengthens the lashes well. More importantly, it doesn't irritate my eyes. That said, though I prefer a formula that both lengthens and adds volume, I need more volume than length, so I decided to try this formula. This formula does not have the rose oil scent, which was a disappointment. Also, as some reviewers have mentioned, it's kind of goopy/sticky, especially in hot weather; it will leave raccoon eyes/flakes if you're sloppy. In that regard, I think M*lk's Kush is better even though that one is goopy, too. If they added the rose oil and made this a less sticky/less likely to migrate under your eyes formula, this would be a staple. But as it is now, I'm on the fence. I'd purchase the lengthening formula again before this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a mini and it was fabulous so I ordered the full size. The full size was a clumpy mess disaster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mascara because I was looking to find a dupe for the now discontinued Bite Beauty Upswing Mascara. Unfortunately, l'm sorry to say that this was NOT it, not even close to being as good.   Instead what I discovered is truly one of the worst mascara's I've ever tried. It has a terrible wand that holds way too much product. The formula is so wet that it takes ages to dry. It gives some volume but zero length. So you end up with short, stumpy lashes that won't lengthen no matter how much you try to build them up. Not even a little bit!   Also when you do try to put on more than 2 coats it just ends up a short, stumpy, clumpy, wet, ugly mess.   After trying this I'm really surprised to see all the positive reviews here. The only thing that I can think of is that these people probably have naturally long lashes. But if that's not you, and you have short, fine lashes then I would definitely keep looking.   If do you want to try a clean mascara by this brand the Limitless Lash has a much better formula. It's still a bit wet, and won't give you a ton of volume or anything, but the wand is better and the formula more buildable than this one.  Though I have to be honest, I've had such a terrible experience with this mascara that I am turned off by this brand at the moment and won't be buying anything from them again for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have bought this again and again! The best volumizing mascara for full eyelashes!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the volume that this mascara gives and I'm able to layer without it getting clumpy on my lashes. It takes a bit to dry but I am just careful not to do too much to smudge it. The downfall of this product is that so much is wasted, the brush gets so full of product that I have to wipe it off on the top before I can apply. I also ran into an issue with the product coming out onto the handle when I close it, so each time I use it I have to use a makeup wipe to wipe it off otherwise I get mascara all over my hands. Love the product, but the functionality is lacking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first use was excellent. After that, it was very difficult to use and didn't give me the volume I needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mascara at the same time as the other ilia mascara they are both terrible formulas. They clump and make crunch looking spider-leg lashes. This is like use if the cheapest drug store mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this mascara! It lasts forever, doesn't flake and lifts and volumizes my lashes like I have on falsies! The only thing I wish is they would come out with brown or black-brown color!

reviews.review_title: Smudges aren't a girl's best friend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this mascara, but I just can't do it. The amount of product that comes out on the brush is overwhelming. I find myself wiping the brush off before I even touch it to my lashes. And lets talk about the wear...it takes awhile to actually dry and set, so I always end up with bits of mascara all around. Second, this smudges like crazy. I end up with dark spots under my eye after each wear. I wish I had only gotten the mini size because now I am stuck with a full tube.

reviews.review_title: If you love smudged mascara, this is for you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product up completely over the last four months, and I'm not impressed. It gets all over my face no matter what I'm wearing - it's like an automatic five o'clock shadow for my eyes. It's also very clumpy and I find the brush a bit too big to be practical. I'd recommend most drugstore mascara over this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite mascara. Goes on great with no clumping and makes my short lashes look much longer. My only wish is that ilia make waterproof mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time I purchased I liked the big brush, the amount that it applies and the deep black color. 2nd time I purchased it irritates my eyes. I even tested other mascaras and it is only this one. Probably won't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very clumpy right from first opening. Brush is comically large - you could do top and bottom at the same time. This goes on so thick your lashes clump together and it doesn't hold a curl because it's too heavy. Leaves tiny globs on my lashes that I can't get out unless I use a separate clean brush to swipe them out.  Does wash off easily with cleanser, doesn't smudge on top (but does with bottom lashes). Will be returning.

reviews.review_title: SOOO glad I tried this brand
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical because I have tried other natural makeup products from pacifica and other brands like bite, and only bite had really good natural lipsticks. I thought let me try it, and it's fantastic! It gives volume and has a ton of product, and lasts all day at my 8-6pm job. I recommend it and love I found a GREAT natural brand that isn't full of toxic chemicals!! Obsessed with this mascara.
Very clumpy. Almost seems like dried/old mascara even brand new. Love that it's a clean product but it's not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a clean beauty mascara a few years ago and tried to mascara. I've never looked back! It's genuinely better than any other mascara I've used.

reviews.review_title: Stay away from this awful brush/mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered the full sized Ilia volumizing mascara after getting a small trial size one. The trial sized one had a fabulous brush and I fell in love. But the full sized one is AWFUL. The brush is clumpy and unusable; it was a complete waste of money. I wish I could return it and get my $$ back. I'll attach pictures of the trial sized brush versus the regular sized brush so you can see the difference.

reviews.review_title: Mascara companies: Please fix your swipers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure what's up w/mascara tube manufacturers but the swiper in the tube of the last (10 mascaras, all brands and high end and low) that i've purchased just do not work effectively.  This one is included in this malfunction, however, i'm at about the 3 week mark and it's finally dried down to the point where it applies nicely without huge clumps or making spider lashes.  My lashes look long and thick and need minimal combing.  The brush is huge but I love big eyes and long lashes and it's not really an issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had tried the other Ilia mascara and loved it but I have never hated a mascara like this one. I never have issues applying mascara but this one is messy, so chunky, and hard to use. It looks horrible. I ahbfnd I am so

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has got to be one of the worst mascaras I've ever tried! Within the first hour of wearing this mascara, I had large dark marks under my eyes from it transferring and flakes started to appear shortly after that. No matter how much I tried to clean it off my face, the next time I looked in the mirror I would have even more smudges and flakes. I threw this mascara away after two weeks of trying it and having the same results no matter what I tried. Definitely would not recommend.

reviews.review_title: So good I had to buy two!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula and how easy to remove and long lasting! definitely my go to on a daily basis, and knowing it's clean makes it even better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product but unfortunately it was a return for me. The formula felt gloopy, it didn't apply evenly, make my lashes look clumpy and uneven. I was not a fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Transfers EVERYWHERE.  Never fully dries down. Makes my eyes itchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brand is my favorite!  It does not go on clumpy; is waterproof, great black color and consistency is perfect.  I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the mini version originally and really liked it and upgraded to the full-size and after a month of use I've decided it has to go. It is really gloopy. I wipe off the wand each time and there's so much product on the wand. I've given it a go and have to say good-bye. I just wonder why the mini version is so much better. It is a bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so surprised to see the negative reviews on this mascara - this is hands down the best volumizing mascara I have ever purchased. It is thickening without being clumpy at all, layers well and doesn't flake at all over a long day of wear. Cannot recommend enough if you are looking for a mascara that gives the appearance of a thicker, fuller lash line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to not like this product because of the price, but it's actually worth the money. I blink really hard from allergies and this mascara does a good job of not getting all over. My lashes look long without having to curl them. Will purchase in full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have had the same favourite mascara since I was in high school (almost a decade) and this one tops it! I received a sample size and loved it! Gives great volume and length without clumping and lasts through the day. I bought the rare beauty one at the same time and find I prefer this but later them sometimes and it's amazing. (This one gives more volume and length meanwhile the rare beauty was more length then volume)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Straight up garbageu2026 one of the worst mascaras I've ever bought. Can't believe I paid the price I did for this, when my Maybelline drug store mascara is half the price and does a way better job. As others have said the wand is always COVERED in so much mascara, even after managing to get 90% of the product off the wand, it clumps my eyelashes together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i got the mini size in my sephora birthday gift & loved it, so i decided to purchase the full size. i was surprised to see that a lot of the reviews said that the mascara was clumpy. unfortunately, i now have to agree with the other reviews. this mascara started clumping my lashes together and the overly thick wand made it really difficult to apply on the inner corner lashes! definitely wouldn't buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is the ultimate! Great for adding volume and length. My favourite brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's decent but takes many coats to get a full look. It definitely lengthens but you gotta put work into it to get volume. The bristles are also quite sharp. One Photo is after 8-10 coats Other photo is one coat (barely any difference on my long lashes)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

Pire masquara jamais achete ! Ne fait que des grumeaux. La brosse est enorme et tache les paupieres. Je devais me demaquiller les paupieres apres l'application ! Je l'ai jete apres 5-6 applications. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Great mascara for all lash types but don't get wet

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product for clean beauty and much better than their limitless lash (white container) one. Does crumble at the end of the day though and hard to wash off but not waterproof. Also can come off if wearing sunscreen or slugging.

reviews.review_title: not for those who don't use powder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of the original ilia mascara, hoping I would love this one, but it's not for me. While I could apply it easily enough, there was too much smudging above and below my eyes after 3 hours of wear. I never usually have this problem with mascaras. It also didn't flake which is why I'm giving it 2 stars instead of 1. I'll stick with the Original formula. Also I thought the wand was too thick. (FYI I do not set my concealer with powder due to dry skin)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far the worst mascara I've ever tried, I don't recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara. It took a few weeks, but I find that often with new mascara that the wand needs to get into a grove where it's not too empty nor full of product. All I know is after about two weeks of it going on a little too wet and clumpy (which was fine, i just would use an old want to finish up the job instead of adding more product) we're in a groove where it adds such perfect length and volume it's amazing. Will def repurchase time and again, and I would say I'm a mascara snob and expect a lot from it. I have decent lashes to start but they need a good plumping and lengthening mascara to get them out of their shell and make them shine - this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely leave reviews, but I felt compelled to. I really had high hopes for this mascara. It is thick, wet and clumpy. It's probably one of the worst mascaras I've ever used. The wand is too big and it gets all over the place. Also, too much product comes out on the wand. It's terrible. I'll stick to Chanel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer the limitless mascara. While this worked and served it's purpose, it was kinda clumpy and hard to get off.

I appreciate that it's u201cclean at Sephorau201d, and it does create great volume! However, I personally found it remained a bit tacky all day. And as a cat owner, it attracted SO MANY cat hairs into my eyeballs lol. Could not take it after a few weeks. Ultimately, I'd recommend for anyone who wouldn't have this issue.

reviews.review_title: Best mascara! No flaking, or clumping. Huge volume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The only mascara I want to use anymore! I've tried all of the best brands, different brushes - everything. This mascara goes on well, is easy to take off (feels almost silky or juicy with just water to remove it) and it doesn't flake.  I think some of the bad reviews might be from  using an old tube. I have noticed that if I try to use the same tube for too long it gets a bit dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product!! I have naturally pretty long eyelashes and this mascara feels so light It makes my lashes look full and long. Absolutely obsessed!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down, the absolute best. Great lengthening, volumizing formula. Washes off super easy. No flaking. Great over a lash primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I have a problem that many mascaras make my eyes itchy, except the ones with micro plastics that rinse off. I don't want that kind of ingredient anymore so I've been on a search. This Ilia mascara is amazing! I have the other ilia one too and it's more a natural look, while this is definitely volumizing! I'm very happy with every Ilia product I've tried so far (about 5 now)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised! This mascara stayed on and didn't run or flake throughout the day. It made my lashes look longer and very little clumping. This product is great for sensitive eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is the best. I've used a lot of different brands, even most recently was loyal to a drug store brand but I will continue using this brand. Product application is smooth, builds well, length & volume, stays put without flaking even through my heavy cardio workouts and come of easily with my pre cleanse and make up cloth without damaging my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many mascaras from benefit to it cosmetics and am honestly really satisfied with this  one! It provides buildable volume and length without any big clumps and does not smudge on me what so ever (have oily/combination skin). I have the mini version and I'd say it's great for travel too! One of the best mascaras!!

reviews.review_title: Solid no mess no muss mascara!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hey Ilia! I was pleasantly surprised by this! Image is ONE coat of mascara, no primer or eyelash curling because I am a lazy gorl! This is a great consistency and the want is very nice. NO trouble with flaking, smudging, transfer, no specks ending up on my face and causing trouble. Not irritating at all either and my lashes feel surprisingly soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the small size for my bday gift and love it. I have always had irritations, burning from so many mascaras and this one hasn't caused one problem. Feels great. I also find it weightless as they say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this but unfortunately this formula flaked off a lot. Pros: was volumizing for my thin lashes; deep black pigment was beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara was clumpy after a few uses and runny in humidity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First, I love Ilia products.  That said, this isn't one of them. I've tried two tubes now and both had the same results. Clumpy on the brush and flaking during the day. I will say I've had better luck mixing it as a base with my other Ilia mascara, but the brush shape is part of the problem. Too difficult to apply.

reviews.review_title: Not as good as the other Ilia mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this because I love the lengthening mascara from Ilia. Sadly, I wish I had no purchased this one and just bought another tube of the other. Save your money and pass on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this mascara because it gives so much volume to my lashes, but unfortunately it smears on me and gives me raccoon eyes. Not great when you're running around the unit for 12hrs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this mascara but it was so disappointing. Too much product is on the wand, even if you wipe it, it feels very thick, and it doesn't dry well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara I have ever used including drugstore and high-end brands. In combination with the growth from lash serum, my lashes have never looked better. I have gotten nonstop compliments from people since I started using this mascara thinking I had extensions or falsies on. Really worth the try. Lash serum I use is Babe Lash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara!!! It makes my lashes look fuller and longer. The only drawback is that it sometimes transfers to my lower lash line by the end of the day if I wear more oil based sunscreens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely clean mascara. It holds up well, lasts all day with no flakes. My lashes feel great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would not recommend this mascara at all. As other reviewers have said, it's super clumpy and both flakes and bleeds under the eye. I've had a bad experience each time I've used it and will not be using up the rest of the bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure why this doesn't have better reviews. I thoroughly enjoy this mascara and will continue to buy it. I have tried many mascaras.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible mascara! Very clumpy and can't get an even application. Looks awful - would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this mascara is so black & so lengthening and volumizing. love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for sensitive eyes! My only wish is that it curled my eyelashes a little more

reviews.review_title: Sincerely the Best Mascara I've Ever Tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me preface this by saying that I've been wearing false lashes almost daily for years now, but since I tried this mascara I actually feel confident enough about my own lashes to not feel like I need falsies. I've tried many, many mascaras over the years, and this is the only one to truly WOW me. This mascara instantly lifts, lengthens and volumizes my lashes, and I'm able to build it up for more drama without it getting clumpy on me. I haven't experienced any burning (even after tearing up) with this mascara, nor do I end up looking like a raccoon at the end of the day. I plan on continuing to purchase this mascara for as long as it is available!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible. Clumpy and left black specs under the eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not my favorite, this product tends to clump more than Ilia's lengthening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this mascara the first few times I used it, and everything went downhill from there. Now it's a clumpy mess and makes my lashes look terrible. Not worth it.

reviews.review_title: Not as good as the limitless lash mascara.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this because I loved their other mascara, limitless lash. It's decent and doesn't really flake but I feel the wand doesn't separate enough or distribute the product well and leaves the eyelashes a little clumpy. I had to use a separate wand after to comb through. It seems like it's tougher to take off also. Glad I tried a mini first. I'll go back to limitless which is my fav.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just didn't work for me. It's was very clumpy, I think because soooo much product is on the wand, and it smudges so badly all around my eyes. I look like I slept in my makeup at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is too much product on the brush. It clumps. If I wipe some product off (e.g., waste it) it works better. Will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Feels and looks great! Very black and I love that it's clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed!!! I've led so many ppl to this mascara.  It's clean and it's goes on very well with no major clumps and def gives volume. It washes off well too!  I use to be a huge fan of the Better than Sex by Too Faced but switched to this and I'm so happy. I have used just about every mascara there is out there, I even purchased the YSL mascara and it's def nothing compared to Ilia.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing! instant lash lift and very very minimal flaking or smudging by the end of the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but sadly it is just okay. It is pretty volumizing but the formula is really clumpy and the brush doesnt distribute the product very evenly. For now I will continue using this since I bought it and I am too lazy to return it but I would not recommend. Use their original bestseller mascara or the glossier one honestly. Both are way better than this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this mascara is one of my new favorites! i would definitely recommend you try i definitely will purchase  this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On the fence. I wanted to like it more, but it's just okay. I normally like the hourglass wand, but this one is a bit clunky. It's not horrible, but I wouldn't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this mascara. It doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes. It does smudge though but so do most mascaras. My first tube seemed to be thinner when applied and my second tube thicker so not sure what is going on there. Overall it's a pretty good mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It really does lengthen but I agree it's a very clumpy mascara and i can't do 2-3 coats like I would with my Lancu00f4me Idole mascara without it clumping so bad

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not totally sure what it is about the brush or something, but I find it difficult to apply without getting mascara on my eyelid or around my eye. Minimal flaking throughout the day. Other than that, I really like this mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Marc Jacobs velvet noir for years and was so sad when it was discontinued, I needed to find a new mascara and took a chance on this one based on reviews. Honestly it's even better than Marc Jacobs. No clumps, huge volume, I love this a lot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YES! This is a deep black mascara, that goes on smooth, no clumps. My lashes look black, & thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The worst mascara. It is very clumpy. I need to use an eyelash comb afterwards every time. A waste of money. The lengthening mascara is far better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This looks great and I feel good about using quality ingredients near my eyes. I was recommended to get this over the seemingly more popular lengthening mascara from Ilia. It's pretty great but noticed a tiny bit of flaming when I applied. I cleaned it off and it wasn't a issue again. I'd buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this mascara alot and here is why:  Clean Adds nice volume and length Looks like false lashes Stays on pretty long and looks good doing it  I will say if water comes in contact with this product on your eyes it mayyyyyy run away a little (but nothing that cannot be fixed).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give it zero stars I would. WAY TOO CLUMPY. I already have long lashes that curl; I just needed something good to really maximize the length and bring out the fullness and it didn't do that. It made my lashes clumpy, stayed wet for hours, and generally is unimpressive. You could buy a drugstore brand that's better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula was volumizing but added no length and was a tad bit clumpy. I much prefer the Lancome Big Monsieur, it delivers just as much volume but is far more flattering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sadly this mascara is terrible. The wand dispenses a lot of product in a messy way. I actually thought I got a defective tube, I thought the stopper was broken and that's why so much product would stay on the wand. I got a second tube but I had the same problem with the second tube. So much product making for a very, very messy application. The middle bristles on the wand are really short so I would end up with a ton of mascara on my eye lid. I didn't get any volume, just a lot of mascara product clumped up and eyelids full of product. Very disappointed since it's such an expensive product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: super thick and clumpy. didn't dry all the way and left my lashes looking like spider legs. good pigment but i did not love this product at all. I would recommend the other mascara by ilia

THE WORST mascara I've ever used. I wish I could give this zero stars. The brush is full of globs of mascara, it applies terribly, after one or two applications I had just 3 giant eyelash clumps. Not to mention, after an hour it's all over my face. After the whole day? I look like a raccoon. It goes everywhere but at the same time impossible to get off my skin at the end of the day even with makeup remover. I liked the other ilia lengthening mascara so thought I'd give this a try which was a bust. Either stick with the lengthening or get another brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WORST mascara i have ever bought! Clumps everywhere, the brush is way to thick and clumped all my eyelashes together. I also used this for the first time to a dinner, my undereyes were a shitshow at the end of the night. DO NOT BUY!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was u201cinfluencedu201d to buy this and what a disappointment! Super clumpy and gets everywhere. Will not buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smudges and makes my eyes red! I don't know what is in this but I have drugstore mascaras that does irritate my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smudge is real with this. So need to return. The lengthening one is way better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the worst mascaras I've ever tried. Clumped and flaked at the get go. I love their Limitless Lash mascara, so I'll be sticking with that one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible. This smudges off all day long. Their lengthening mascara is WAY better u2014 it looks better and STAYS ON.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Applies smoothly Unscented Volumizing  Cons: Leaves smudges even with curling Won't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Awful. I got the mini sized one for a gift and it was amazing. No clumps, smears, and kept my lashes up all day long. I don't know what went wrong with the normal sized one. The brush is clumpy, way to big, and the formula is awful. It smears and flakes all day long. It's so clumpy on the brush it looks like it doesn't even have bristles. Very disappointed and absolutely cannot believe that I wasted 28$ on this complete waste of a mascara. The worst I've ever tried. Do not waste your money, it's not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this when they didn't have the ILIA's lengthening formula in stock. What a mistake. The brush is enormous and is always full of clumps. It also smudges all day long, I'm having to wipe under my eyes constantly. Would never buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Makes my lashes look so long and easily buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clumpy, flaky, dries out quickly, doesn't separate eyelashes at all. I would never buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product because I loved Ilia lengthening mascara. However this one is clumpy and flaky and difficult to apply. I end up with it all over my face and it does not hold up. It flakes off easily. So bummed about this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Non pas pour moi! Il a un effet collant et n'allonge pas bcp jai vue mieux

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad I gave ILIA another try. I tried ILIA Limitless Lash Lengthening Mascara at first and was super disappointedu2026 but then I saw this. It is comparable to Lancome Monsieur Big Volumizing Mascara (which is my absolute favorite).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was totally not expecting to love this mascara as much as I do! I've been swearing by a select few waterproof mascaras for the past few years because they were typically the only ones that could hold my curl all day and give me the length and volume I wanted. I'm so glad I gave this mascara a try.. it does everything my waterproof mascara as do without being waterproof, meaning it is much easier to remove. That being said, this formula definitely still stays out and doesn't smudge or transfer on me (and I do have rather oily eyelids).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Makes eyelashes lengthen and doesn't clump. No spider eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: (received as a sample using my Sephora points) Pretty impressed so far! I am picky with mascara as I have long lashes and often find I get flaking and smudging throughout the day if I don't use an eyeshadow primer.  Also, I want long, luscious, fanning lashes, no clumps, no spiders legs pls.  This stuff adds nice length and separation and stays on well throughout the day even without the addition of an eyelid primer to stop oiliness from breaking it down!  It wont give you a falsies look, but it is nice for an enhanced ~almost natural~ look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best mascara especially for shirt sparse eye lashes. Extremely black doesn't flake! All time fav

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! So volumizing and doesn't break your eye lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing volumizing mascara BUT I can't use it on the bottom lashes cause it runs :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really surprised around the hype of this mascara. The mascara comes out in clumps and I have to scrape off the mascara before applying it. It also makes my lashes very clumpy. I thought I received a bad batch from Sephora but then I purchased from their website and had the same issue. I'll stick to their original mascara, which was way better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'll be sticking to the original ilia mascara.  This didn't do it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed with this new mascara from Ilia. I use their other mascara as my go-to, so I was excited to try this one out. The applicator brush is huge, making it hard to put on without leaving mascara on your eyelids/skin. The weird brush size also made it so that every time I pulled out the applicator from the bottle, it left this large clump of mascara on the end of it, which I then had to either wipe off onto the bottle or onto a napkin (effectively wasting a ton of extra mascara) each time. I'm not sure what it different either with this formula, but it reallyy irritated my eyes. I tried wearing it for several days and by the end of each work day my eyes were red, glassy and burning. I couldn't wait to get home to wash my face and get this off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this because I love the Ilia skin tint serum. It gets 3 stars from me because I like the clean formulation, it really makes your lashes look great, and it's easy to remove so your lashes won't fall out. BUT it transfers quite a bit throughout the day even with a lash primer on. By the end of the day I look like a raccoon and that's unfortunately a deal breaker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Eas excited to try because I love ILIAs other mascara, but this one is terrible. It's clumpy, inconsistent, takes a long time to set, flakes, smudges and all that fun stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought the Mini to try it out and ended up loving it so much that I bought the full size. The brush is curved and is different from the mini which is violin shaped. While I love the mascara it's more difficult to apply with the full size brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Do not buy this product. Goes on clumpy, and ends up all over your face. I got home after running errands, looked in the mirror, and realized I had mascara ALL over the place. Not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It applied smoothly and didn't clump.  Buuuuutu2026it started flaking after 6-7 hours.  It lengthened, but didn't thicken as much as I'd like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Brush picks up too much product. Lashes stick together and look heavy. Limitless lash is way better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product because I am a big fan of the Ilia Limitless mascara but was disappointed. This mascara was flakey and clumpy. Volumized lashes somewhat but no length. Going back to using the Limitless mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot understand all the good reviews. I've been loving all of my other Ilia products except for this one. It's everything I hate in a mascara: clumps, causes lashes to stick together (so less volume not more), difficult to apply (the brush is HUGE). However, once it is applied it does stay put (as long as you don't rub, it's not waterproof) and washes off easily. Nice rich black color.

reviews.review_title: Looking for the raccoon look? This is for you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a clean beauty brand for a good mascara and Ilia was highly recommended but omg, this one is a hard pass for me! I do not sweat a lot and never had this issue before but this mascara was getting all over my eyelids not even 2 hours after applying!! I look like a raccoon for crying out loud!! So yeah, I don't recommend it, heard the other one from Ilia is better but I'd buy the mini to test it out first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly this is crap. It gets all over your eyelids. The other ilia mascara is way better. This mascara clumps my eyelashes together and makes them go straight. There is no volume. Other options are so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it so far .. gives my lashes so much volume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Eww, it picks up way too much product, and I have to swipe a ton off before I put it near my lashes. Yeah, it volumizes, which is good, but they could really work on the design of the tube to clear off excess as you're pulling it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Are we using the same product? I'm so confused by the positive reviews here. I really like the Ilia Limitless Mascara and thought I'd give this one a try. This mascara was so thick and clumpy it was almost impossible to apply without major smudging and tons of excess product. Honestly, it was a mess. I tried to clean the brush off, but it kept getting jammed up. It was unusable, had to throw it out. This product just doesn't make sense.

reviews.review_title: One of the worst mascaras I have ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first Ilia product that I would call a total failure. The brush is MASSIVE, getting mascara all over my lashline. The product consistency is a gloopy mess, clumping my eyelashes into three or four spikes. I threw away a nearly brand-new tube because I just couldn't use it.

reviews.review_title: Save your $ and get the Ilia Limitless
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted the Ilia limitless mascara but it was sold out at the Sephora location I was in and I was desperate for mascara. So picked this one up instead assuming it would be just as good as the limitless. It is not. This mascara is terrible. It's thick, clumpy from the first use as in chunks of product visible on your lashes + clumping your lashes together. I used it twice and could not get over how terrible it was. Returned it. Would not recommend this one, get the limitless (although not volumizing) it's MUCH better

reviews.review_title: Please never stop making this mascara
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new holy grail of amazingness. I was someone that had used the same mascara for YEARS but wanted to try something different and I've been trying a bunch of different types over the last few months and I will LOOOK NO FURTHER !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a very thick mascara and you have the patience of a saint - this would be a good mascara to layer.   It goes on very thick, even when you scrap the mascara off of the wand first - it does clump and it does flake onto your eyelids and beneath.  You will spend a lot of time trying to separate your lashes and cleaning up.  It was a complete time suck and after 2 months I tossed it.  Complete waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing mascara! I typically only use tube mascaras because I find the regular kind clumps and falls off throughout the day. This does not fall off. It does clump to an extent, but if you learn how to apply and work through it there's no major clumping. Love this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this because I love their other mascara but I am disappointed with this formula.  So clumpy! Huge brush, makes for messy application.  I recommend their other mascara, not this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Ilia's Limitless Lash and all their other products I've tried, so when it was time for another tube of mascara I took the chance on this new one. Not a fan - the brush is huge and comes out with soooo much product on it that it's way too hard to use. Checking Ilia's website it seems they recommend a specific technique, but even the photos they show look really clumpy to me. Missed the return window unfortunately but I'm sticking with their other version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in a Christmas set. I naturally have long lashes and this mascara wouldn't lift them or make the long/voluminous as promised. It was clumpy after two coats and only got progressively worse. The brush is very big, making it hard to reach inner and outer corners. Easy to remove and no smudging during the day, but that is the only plus. Sadly, in the garbage it goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have naturally long lashes. This somehow made them look shorter? I also really hate the formula because it clumped SO MUCH. This was recommended to me by a Sephora store manager because my goto Buxom was out of stock in stores and online. Sadly, I cannot recommend it.
Sticky. Heavy. Clumpy. Hate the brush. The other mascara by Ilia is amazing, and honestly provides fuller, greater volume than this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love it but smudged easily and often for me - kind of a pain to get off but looks great on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: People will ask you the brand of false lashes you're wearing and will think you're lying when you tell them you're not wearing any...that's how good this mascara is. A little bit goes a lot way. Two swipes and my lashes are touching my eyebrows with the perfect amount of volume. Easy to remove, but stays on all day - water works approved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far very satisfied. Wore this mascara only a few times. No major compliants yet. I get extreme length top and bottom lashes. Volume, moderate. Never do I apply three coats of mascara. But with Ilia fullest I can actually apply three coats without clumpy lashes. I want the longest lashes I can get. This works! Lashes are very well defined even with three coats! It's a buildable mascara and does feel weightless. Especially for a volumizing mascara. 100% better than BTS mascara. I've had experiences with volumizing mascaras over time getting clumps of mascara on the wand. I cannot speak for that currently because only used it a few times. Time will tell... Does smudge lower lash line but not overly significant. I deal with that with majority of mascaras. So far, excellent mascara for extreme length and separation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product but it didn't work well for my lashes. I found the brush to be too big, making it hard to get close to the lash line. As well, it made my lashes clump. On a happy note, I tried the Ilia limitless lash mascara and it is AMAZING. My lashes have never looked so good.
Clumpy and smudges like crazy. Really disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: saw this mascara on tiktok first so i decided to give it a try and get the smaller version. the first few times i used it, and maybe this was caused by my contacts or my moisturizer/sunscreen, but it kind of made my eyes burn/sting? it went away eventually and i don't have this problem anymore. it's an amazing mascara and i will definitely be repurchasing!! i think my lashes stay curled a lot longer compared to other mascaras i've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it !! the volume is insane and i would definitely recommend it. My new fav mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the limitless mascara by Ilia. It has been my go to for years now so I was very excited about this one and it was just not it. there is so much product that is clumps all over the brush and is nearly impossible to apply. Once on it clumps like crazy and smudge throughout the day. I have only worn it a few times because the application is just horrible. Very disappointed, I'd look else where for mascara especially at this super high price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this as I love the original ilia mascara. I usually don't have strong opinions on mascara but this one was legitimately bad. It's overly thick and clumpy and the wand is so messy for some reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I returned this after one use. The wand was too thick to deal with and got the mascara everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried just about every mascara, ever. I have stick straight stubborn lashes that typically do not hold a curl. I used to have to use a waterproof mascara to hold a curl, which left my lashes dry, brittle and sad. I have never and I mean NEVER found a regular mascara, let alone a clean one - that holds a curl, and makes my lashes so pretty! Considering that it's clean, this mascara does make my lashes look considerably darker, thicker and longer. I've also been using this mascara for about two months and have noticed that my lashes are looking healthier overall.  This mascara is about as close to perfection as any mascara has ever gotten for me. It holds a curl (probably due to the beeswax?), makes my lashes look lush and has nourishing ingredients. A total HG for me! Ilia don't you ever discontinue this magical mascara!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the original ILIA mascara so when I bought this one I was very disappointed; The product itself makes your lashes very clumpy and the brush is too big. Don't recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure how this is made by Ilia since I usually love all of their products. The brush is bulky & awful, and the formula started to clump after it's third use. Super disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy I got to try this as a free sample! this is one of the best mascaras yet! makes my lashes super long and full! I am sooo getting another one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Pinchme to try in exchange for my honest review. This is now my go to mascara. It's lenthening and volumizing. The brush seperates my lashes. Giving me long, thick lashes. This mascara doesn't clump or smudge. It lasts all day with no flaking. I use this mascara everyday. It has quickly became a favorite of mine. I highly recommend this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So amazing! Easy to apply and add the perfect amount of volume and fullness. Hands down the best mascara I've ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an honest review from PinchMe. I tried loving this mascara. It was working wonders for me the first couple of times I used it. The brush does hold a lot of product and I constantly had to remove the excess. Then it started clumping. Did not love it. Maybe it was a bad batch?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love using mascara's, that provide good definition from length to volume with high black pigments. ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara does all of that. It separates my lashes, so they don't clump up, boost with volume & give my lashes high black pigment, which i love. This mascara also has a moisturizing effect, which i never had before. It gives my lashes condition. Amazing mascara, that really works with my lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this formula so much and like any mascara, you should always use it a few times to really form an opinion.  I have been using this for 3 weeks and I love how my lashes look and feel! After use, lashes are still soft and flexible throughout the day.  The formula coats the entire lash for a full, beautiful, open eyed look. I think my lashes  look healthy even when I'm not wearing it, this formula is nourishing my lashes! Love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this mascara a while ago and I thought it was going to be just like Too Faced. For a clean mascara it's definitely AMAZING, which is why I'm giving it 4 stars. However, I don't know if it's just my bottle, but it seems like there is too much product in the bottle or something? Like it's overflowing and too much product gets on my wand, so I have to sit and scrape it off before I put it on my lashes. So I rarely reach for this mascara since there is so much work involved in using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara u2014 in my opinion it's way better than their original mascara and gives beautiful volume and length. Favorite mascara of the year by far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample and I really loved this mascara. It helped to separate my lashes and lengthen them. I really like that it doesn't have a strong smell to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lengthens and makes your lashes look great! But my lashes stayed wet the entire time. If I changed shirts or hit my lashes they didn't look right.

reviews.review_title: Clumped my lashes into sections. So bad!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Brush clumped my lashes together in ways i have never seen. I had like 4 big pointy long lashes, it was horrendous. Wanted to love it but after this happened I can not accept it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was definitely one of the best mascara I've ever used. I didn't experience any clumping and my lashes were think and long all day without any touch ups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this mascara, love all Ilia products. Currently using super serum, primer, blush stick, lip balm, powder,etc. This brush was just too big for me, very hard to work with, didn't quite get the shape of the brush, dipped in the middle, hard to apply without getting all over my lids, tried many times, very disappointed. I did try using my other mascara brush from another to try and smooth clumps, . But definitely don't want that much hassle to apply my mascara. Also I had raccoon eyes a few hours after application. Just a miss for me, sorry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product but the brush was just too big for me to work. I couldn't apply without making mess around my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and I really enjoyed it. The issue I had was that too much of the product gets on the applicator and gets a bit messy. Great product but needs improvement on brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product free from pinch me for a review and I love it. My lashes are so full and voluminous. They hold their curl all day, and look like falsies. The only problem I had was that it transfers to the lower part of my eye even when I'm not wearing lower lash mascara. Other than that it's great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of the Limitless Lash version, so I thought I'd give the Fullest Volumizing a try - but I'll be sticking with Limitless Lash from now on.  The brush for this mascara is so big that it feels clumsy; and the mascara flakes off so that I end up with dark circles under my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara as a trial and I disliked it. I found it messy (getting mascara all over my lid) and clumpy. I prefer the other mascara ilia offers and recommend you pick that one over this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure at first, but now this is my favorite and go-to mascara. I have sensitive eyes, and every single other mascara would leave me feeling itchy and irritated. Doesn't flake and only smudges a little bit after several hours (I consider this a success!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprisingly not a big fan of this in comparison to the other Ilia mascara. The brush is so big that it makes me eyelashes look a little clumpy and/or smudges onto my eyelids upon application. It always gets on my lower lashes too even when I do mean it to. I like the petite-ness of the other Ilia brush more  I will say though this seems like a thicker formula so it shows more upon application which is enticing. Just not worth it for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the original formula. This new formula smudges terribly and I find the brush to be too large to get to my inner lashes. The brush applies way too much product and it's hard not to have the mascara not get clumpy on the lashes. I've worn this multiple times and it's never worked out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: New favourite. Doesn't flake, lasts all day, even in the humid Hawaii weather.  Washes off fairly easily too!

reviews.review_title: Significant volume for my thin lashes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with sparse and straight Asian lashes, this mascara has done wonders for me. I can't use it alone since like most mascaras, it weighs my lashes down and straighten the curls immediately. However, I'm able to use this as a layering mascara on top of something that holds my lashes' curl. It adds significant volume and if applied well, builds the length too. I haven't noticed any smudging either with all-day wear, which is always a plus. Personally I like this a lot better than ILIA's previous cult favorite limitless lash mascara, which didn't do much for my tiny lashes at all. This one is a game changer and I'm happy to see its release. The brush is fairly large and loaded with product, so be prepared for some smearing on the lids during application. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, it is nothing special for its price. It smudges a lot and makes the lashes look really clumpy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Flaky, huge wand makes for clumpy gobby lashes and it's hard to control.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: But the original!!! Raccoon eyes within hours!! The original is great!! So glad I tried the mini first and now will just stick with the original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the wand! The product went on smoothly and it didn't clump! It just looked amazing!

reviews.review_title: Other Ilia Mascara is so much better!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the other ilia mascara, wanted to give this one a try.... doesn't even compare! This one smudges a ton under my eyes throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to loved this but this was definitely made for people with decently full lashes. It smudged through out the day and clumped together for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the ILIA brand but was disappointed with this product. The brush is too fat and the mascara is clumpy.  It did nothing to enhance lash length. It was difficult to apply and I usually ended up with it going everywhere.  I ended up buying another brand even though this tube was brand new.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gives volume and length, but smudges by mid-day without touching eyes. Don't even put mascara on my bottom lashes and somehow my under eyes turn grey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was ok- very clumpy for me and I have small thin eyelashes

reviews.review_title: I so badly wanted to love this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this, I really did.  I don't know if it was user error, but I didn't love this mascara.  I felt like it didn't apply evenly and trying to use that mascara wand was a whole other issue.  I can't speak much to the actual mascara formula because I had such an issue with the want that I ended up removing the mascara and didn't try it again.  Hopefully everyone else is having better luck figuring it out than I am.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible mascara, smudges almost immediately after applying it. This is the only mascara I've ever used that gives me raccoon eyes within the first 15 minutes of wearing it. After 4 hours it's almost completely gone and just black is left around my eyes. Packaging is beautiful but the product is trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best mascara I've ever tried. I had a couple favorites I rotated between, but I won't go back to either. I love the shape of the brush and how well it lengthens and volumizes my lashes. It's a huge plus that it's a clean beauty brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst mascara I think I've ever bought. The brush is so thick that it's too big to even get onto your lashes properly. I can't even get the formula to go on all of my lashes because of how big the brush is. Maybe other people that use this have bigger eyes than me or something? Idk I've never had this issue with any other mascara. Also does not separate your lashes at all.
I don't love this one as much as the other Ilia mascara. this one gets on the top of your eyelids

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always on the hunt to try new mascaras. I loved everything about this until after 3 uses it started getting clumpy. Maybe I just got a bad batch? Not sure if I'd try again tho. Only rated 2 stars because I liked the brush. It's very versatile for hitting your lashes at different angles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very clumpy! Not as good as their original mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love their limitless mascara so I had to give this one a try. This one gave my lashes so much volume and length!!! I did NOT experience any cumpling. The only downside is that it flakes a few hours in but a quick wipe takes care of that. Their limitless never flakes BUT I feel this one gave me more length. I really like them both, so I have both. lol

reviews.review_title: Nice Mascara but Spooly Could be Improved
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very creamy and thick without clumping.  The brush is a little too thick. Ilia could improve with a more tapered spooly versus an hourglass shape. I wish they improve on the spooly shape for easier application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased for my granddaughter and myself.  Loved it....doesn't clump, lashes look great and we both got compliments on our lashes!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the beautiful packaging this mascara came in. Very sleek looking and a bit heavy.  I got amazing lashes from this mascara. Long and very full. The only down side is that it doesn't last all day and it flakes pretty bad. It only looks good for a couple of hours. Not waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just buy a $5 Mascara .it's much better then this. I don't even want it for free ,because all your eyelashes stick together

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this mascara. it does everything i want for in a mascara. it gives my lashes lengh and volume which is great. it doesn't really clump that much which is a plus. Would recommend.

reviews.review_title: Save your money and don't buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This made my lashes clump together so bad. Stick to their limitless mascara it's way better- not as thick and clumpy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: ehhh ... it's good for the 2 seconds it's on your lashes. smudges within minutes. messy, clumpy, wet formula makes it impossible to get a good application, and the colour is off somehow. big pass, especially for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wish I could love it. The packaging is great and do is the brush but overal the mascara clumps my lashes. I have to use another brush to seperate the lashes.
