reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The brush is too big and comes out messy.  The brush look nothing like what you see online. And it makes my lashes so clumpy. I regret buying this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does what it says it will,  but can the brush come out of the tube cleaner?  Goes on thick and gets messy.  You can't rush apply this mascara at all.  But otherwise,  voluminous lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! It curls my lashes and they look amazing all day. I have very sensitive eyes and this one does bother me by end of day but its no big deal, all mascaras are difficult on my eyes. My new fave!

reviews.review_title: Difficult to apply without clumping, a mess.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me, this mascara was clumpy and impossible to manage without scraping, scraping, scraping to get an almost naked wand. Clumps on the ends of my lashes, and for the first time in a decade I dredged out my eyebrow brush to separate clumped lashes.  That was bad enough, but it also didn't last. It smeared under both eyes leaving me with tired looking rings.   I LOVE the other Ilia mascara so I don't know why I even switched.  Not an upgrade for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a fine mascara especially if you want to have a clean mascara. But it doesn't separate your eyelashes so when you apply it, it just clumps on. I also don't think it lengthens my eyelashes. I loved the other Ilia mascara. But I won't be buying this one again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked Ilia Mascara, It does what it promises by leaving lashes with volume and lengthens them, the reason why I give it 3 stars,It is because it undoes the curl completely, I have short and straight eyelashes, I expected it to be my favorite mascara but no, For those who have naturally curled eyelashes They are going to love this mascara. I received a free sample from PINCHme in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! I get tons of volume, and just like the other Ilia it looks great. 4 stars just because after a few hours I get a little smudging in the outer corner of my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't buy a lot of high-end mascaras anymore, but I'd definitely consider repurchasing this one. The formula is nice, it didn't give me clumpy lashes, yet still gave a nice amount of fullness. It sometimes leaves residue on my eyelid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample, and while I wanted to like it, it just did not work for my lashes, which are light and fine. It really clumped on immediately, like the first swipe. I think the brush shape was the problem there, the actual mascara seemed like it could be lightweight if I applied with a different wand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for anyone used to combining two formulas or brush shapes when applying mascara. You get a really nice formula and a brush that easily does both. Reminds me of a mix of Definicils, Perversion, maybe Bad Gal a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really impressed with this mascara! I have thin, short, blonde, lashes, and this mascara actually makes me have beautiful lashes! It gives them a nice rich color, and I just love the volume and separation that I'm able to achieve. No flaking or smudging either! Will definitely purchase when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Things this mascara has going for it: it doesn't smudge on me (and I wear usually 10-14 hours for work) and it holds a curl. This is a volumizing mascara, and it does, but the wand applies a whole lot of product at once and the bristles are such that it doesn't separate your lashes to balance the intense application of product, leaving them looking clustered together and spidery (though curled). Honestly, it's a less effective version of the bite upswing, missing that special oomph the bite can give my lashes. Also, I have deeper set eyes and often get mascara marks on my lids and this formula is REAL tough to take off with a spoolie. That's a small thing, but if you do eyeshadow before lashes like me, it gets annoying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, I'm one of these people that always read but I read to write a review about this mascara. For years I always used a combo of 2 maybelline mascaras to give me volume, separation and length. Im 30 and I've been like u201cok time to invest in a mascara and try to get one that does it allu201d. I tried with Lancome Idole, which is good, but it dried out faster than I thought it would (and ser, Im VERY careful with my makeup). I went to Sephora to get the Limitless Ilia mascara, but the woman in the store said this one just came out and it was great. I gave it a shot and honestlyu2026LIFE CHANGING! You should try and quick tip (applies for all mascaras): give it a few tries. First and second time was like not so good..on the third trial I was on love with it! Worths the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of mascara is this is one of my favorites. Not clumpy, looks clean and keeps my lashes full without smudging or flaking off throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product because I am a huge fan of the other ILIA mascara but this is honestly terrible. It always transfers onto my eye lids and under eyes. I live in the south and the humidity of a regular day makes this a nightmare! The wand is also HUGE and clumps terribly. Save your $$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have full short lashes and typically turn away from volumizing mascaras, but this one gives both good volume and length!! You will be able to add layers and it doesn't give you that u201cspider legu201d look. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sold on this product in-store. At the time, it was a Sephora best seller although I'm not sure how/where that came from. First time trying this brand and was hoping to like but unfortunately formula doesn't seem to u201cdryu201d and transfers to the top of my eyelids and/or smudges underneath. Wouldn't recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed in this mascara.  Brush is too big and makes my lashes super clumpy and weighs them down.  I have to use in combination with the original lengthening mascara.  After a few hours it smears a bit above my upper eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing this on IG I was anxious to try this mascara.  It lengthens and builds with a few coats, but it transfers and smears under my eyes by midday. I live in a hot dry desert climate and my skin is not oily. I'll stick with Bad Gal Bang for simpler lengthening, darkening and staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Created the worst and largest smudges under my eyes within a few hours which is not normal for me- also did not hold curl at all and weighed down my lashes making them droopy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Would never buy it again. First of all it create lumps. Secondly when trying to wash the product off it create a huge mess in your face. The original mascara by ilia is so much better. The formulas are very different.

reviews.review_title: pretty good, but wish they had brown
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is good mascara - I like a natural-ish but better look and this does it well. It's clean, and I've been trying to only buy clean so that's great. My only complaint is that I wish it came in a black/brown option. I have really fair skin and auburn hair, and black makeup of any kind tends to look too harsh on me - I usually use charcoal gray or dark brown liners instead of black. Unfortunately very few brands carry brown or black/brown, and they aren't clean (Clinique, Lancu00f4me). I'm hoping someone will one of these daysu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara is everything! Let's start by saying I hate clumpy mascara with passion. I was emo once, not interested in going back. This mascara gave me great volume without looking messy and/or clumpy. The brush design made it super easy to apply. Yes, I did have to clean the brush a little bit before applying but I always do that with every mascara so I don't see why people are complaining about that. The formula seems more lightweight that other mascaras I've used and it was also super easy to remove. The design of the product overall was 10/10. The packaging was simple yet looked sophisticated. I have never really heard about this brand before receiving the free product from PINCHme and did a little research only to find out they are cruelty free and clean brand. So again, what's not to LOVE?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the ILIA Volumizing Mascara. It looked great on my lashes. No flaking or caking. My lashes looked and felt great. I love the ingredients and ease of applying. I received a sample from PINCHme in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great mascara!No clumping! Goes on smooth and lengths leashes.

reviews.review_title: Not worth it for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worked amazing me my lashes look for and pretty but also made my eyes water a lot while wearing the mascara. And smudges because of my eyes watering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara for free.  This mascara gives you a fuller, thicker and healthier lashes but since the brush is too big and thick is almost impossible not get a mess on the lids and make a clean application. I do prefer a slim brush to avoid this issue as the Limitless Lash Mascara which I love, but again this one actually gives a lot of volume. However I wonu00b4t buy it, sorry. I received this #freeproduct #sponsored from #pinchme #happypincher and #iliabeauty in exchange for my honest review. All opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a decent mascara! It's definitely volumizing but I don't really like the way it appliesu2026it's a little clumpy and gets on my eyelids and lower lashes pretty easily. Next time I'd choose a different mascara but I think it's up to preference and what you're looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After giving this a try for 2 weeks I definitely am sticking with their Lengthening mascara. This one transfers onto my skin under my lower lashes throughout the day and it's a pain to completely wash off in the evening. I feel like it never full comes off haha. Does give volume and the brush is nice and fluffy but will not repurchase after I finish this tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazingu2026 until it smudges a few hrs later :( This initially looks amazingu2014 fluffs lashes, volumizes, but.. and this is kind of the deal breaker, it smudges under my eyes after only a few hrs (3-4) and leaves light black smudges that only accentuate dark circles. To be clear, I only wear it on my top lashes. So this transfers below, which is a huge bummer. Sticking to the Limitless lash since that's not as smudgy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this mascara as I've been a big fan of their other mascara, limitless . Not a big fan of this one compared to the limitless , this one does not wash off easily like the limitless. Not as good for sensitive eyes or contacts either. I like the applicator on this one but the formula just isn't as nice. Will be switching back to the limitless from ilia which I've loved for a long time now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how it looks so much when you put it on, but within 3-4 hours it ends up completely smudged under my eyes.

reviews.review_title: lots of volume and no clumps
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara for free in exchange for an honest review. I like the applicator with this mascara. The mascara itself is very wet and watery which I prefer because I don't end up with clumpy eyelashes. The volume that the ILIA Fullest Volumizing Mascara gives my eyelashes lasts all day. This mascara isn't waterproof at all so any water will make it smudge. Luckily, I don't live somewhere it rains often. I found this mascara does take a little longer than normal to dry but the results are worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the brush on this and the packaging aesthetic, although I wish more beauty products were recyclable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very good and natural looking. doesn't clump. volumized well.  stays on a long time. easy to get off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara has a really nice black color and smooth formula. I like that the mascara applies evenly and doesn't clump my lashes. The applicator seems fairly big, but it's easy to quickly apply mascara to all of my lashes. The formula feels pretty wet and smudges easily, however after drying, it doesn't flake off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara. I like how the wand is thick. I feel like with thicker wands you get fuller lashes. I defenitly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible. Makes eyelashes stick together. Clumpy lashes and takes forever to dry. Return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately I still can't find a perfect clean mascarau2026and this one goes to that same bucket of those that I tried and they just not doing it for me. I the morning it's sort of hard to apply it (wound is a mess) and in the night I come to the mirror and see black circles under my eyes - it smudges pretty bad. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received as a gift via pinch me.Loved the Ilia fullest mascara.Its creamy and not lumpy.It adds volume and shine to my lashes.Loved the sleek package.I have natural black lashes and they are perfect match.Definitely recommended it.It is my new favorite mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received ILIA FULLEST VOLUMIZING MASCARA as a free sample from PINCHme. It really did a great job of increasing the volume of my lashes. The applicator is very easy to hold and use. The wand helps you evenly distribute the mascara without creating extra mess. I really like the color of the outside case and the sleekness of what it is made out of.

This mascara was great.  Goes on smooth, clump-free and stays that way all day.  I love the fact that it really provided volume for my nonexistent lashes without flaking off.  But also very easy to remove at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Who doesn't love clean beauty?  Good to know that I'm not putting sketchy ingredients in my eyes! I thought this was a good mascara, smelled good and, gave me volume as promised. Sadly it did smudge a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample from Pinchme and it was amazing. My lashes extended in length and mascara was light. I loved the way my lashes looked and felt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! The brush is so unique and helps get the mascara onto my lashes on edges. It goes on evenly and non-clumping, nor does it streak or smear. It seems to dry quickly and is easy to wash off. It makes my thin lashes pop a little, too. Great mascara!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this mascara. It goes on and comes off easily. It has a nice consistency that doesn't clump. I will purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of the Ilia Fullest Volumizing  Mascara. In the past, I didn't use mascara too often, but now that I do most of my work and run errands with a mask covering my face, I've started to pay more attention to my eyes including eye makeup. I love the way this mascara went on and how it made my lashes look. It was a smooth application and I also felt good about using a clean product. I tend to have sensitive eyes, which is also why I didn't use much eye makeup before, but I didn't have a reaction to this Ilia mascara at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way it extends my lashes and gives volume. Love the brush and how natural looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This ILIA volumizing mascara works great. I like how my lashes are separated and volumized after apply. This goes on smoothly and rinses off with ease. Definitely my new favorite. Great mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its a decent mascara, i like it, but it has a pretty strong scent and smudges under my eyes quite a bit throughout the day. Not my fav

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a free sample of this mascara with my order. It is super clumpy and hard to apply. I'm not a huge fan of the brush. It also smudges like you would not believe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this product was great. The formula was a little wet; however it did not effect the end results. I thought the brush was okay, it takes a little time to get used to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara. It's amazing. It goes on so easy and makes my eyelashes long and voluminous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great mascara!! I love the length and curl it gives! It isn't to dry and isn't really wet either. No clumps and I like the simplicity of the packaging. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was very impressed with this ILIA FULLEST VOLUMIZING MASCARA. I had never heard of this brand prior to trying the mascara and it did not disappoint. I have very long full natural lashes and therefore have difficulty with clumping with most of the mascara's I've tried in the past. I was pleasantly surprised to find that this mascara was extremely volumizing without causing clumps! It created beautiful, very full, and voluminous lashes that didn't feel heavy or weighed down like I have experienced with other mascara's specifically geared to provide volume. I was also pleased with the products ingredients as it contains provitamin B5 and Arginine. I usually end up loosing alot of lashes when removing my mascara but with this product removal was simple, painless, but most of all.. I didn't notice any fall out of my lashes. I feel reassured knowing the B5 and Arginine are helping to enhance the fullness of my natural lashes and also strengthen them with these fortifying and nourishing ingredients. This was definitely a plus as I said before the other mascaras I use that are able to provide this look with usage ultimately tend to damage my lashes afterwards. The packaging of this product was also impressive. It was very pretty but also felt and looked like a high end luxury brand made product. I would definitely recommend this product. Especially for those on the fence who haven't ever tried this brand before like myself. You won't regret it! I only took one star away for the price as there are a few drugstore products that stand up to this product but are at a much lower price point. That being said, compared to the other high end mascara's..this is actually a pretty good reasonable price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iliad mascara is great with full coverage mascara that lengthens and thickens lashes in a snap! Love the brush design as it helps mascara go on smoothly with no flaking. I would definitely recommend this to friends and family.  Nice to have  product that doesn't clump!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! I used the better than sex mascara forever and it was so irritating and flaky, this is the best one I've found that gives the same volume without bugging my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this Volumizing Mascara from Ilia.  The curved brush made it easy to apply and there was no clumping or smudging.  Separated my lashes easily and created a dramatic look.  Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The shape of the applicator made it easy to apply. The ILIA mascara was smooth and I love that it's a natural product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used before some mascaras like Lash Paradise, and Monsieur Big (pretty dramatic) in their waterproof formulas because my lshes are flat and the weatheru2026  My lashes always are like kinda sad, I even usea a lash curler to lift them a little bit, but I know it won't last.  Well, when I opened the mascara, I put a smile on my face, the brush it's the kind I like, and the color BLACK it's the Blackest black I've ever seen ! Darker than my soul.  The brush is good, the color is amazing, the package is minimalist and pretty and it's clean, and gives a natural look. That's obviously what a clean mascara is meant to be, I was disappointed because I had the expectation of a waterproof  drugstore mascara, my bad. Gives you long, black, natural look.  I won't purchase, just keep looking for my true love because I really need the lift, and honestly I'm looking for a black brown color, but if you don't need the lifting one, this one is good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a promo code redemption, it is the best mascara I have ever triedu2026. Soooo amazing, so natural .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara applicator feels really fluffy and satisfying on the lashes but it doesn't allow for as precise an application as the limitless mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: fantastic Mascara, it doesn't clump and wears well all day long

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new holy grail! I can't believe how beautiful this looks. I don't where lashes and I do not need to with this mascara. It's easy to clean up and come off. I love how the wand is easy on the eyes and how it applies! Y'all definitely need to try this it's amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the volume and lushness of the Ilia mascara. The brush applies the mascara without clumps and is precise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara has been working well for me. The mascara thickens, lifts, and separates leaving full lashes. And it's buildable, but I only really need one coat. I haven't experienced smudging, flaking, or irritation, and it washes off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: There was literally no volume. The formula feels very dry and makes my lashes look flaky. Not a good look. My natural lashes looked better before applying this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of their original mascara, been using it for years so when this one came out I had to tryu2026 unfortunately I was so disappointed :( it clumps and lashes stick together, the more you apply the worse it looks. Not buying this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Who doesn't like nice long eyelashes? I know, I do. I love that not only this ILlia fullest volumizing mascara gives me long eyelashes, but it is also a natural mascara! I like that it's easy to use, doesn't clump and separates my eyelashes nicely. It also gives my eyelashes an uplifted look. I thoroughly enjoyed using this mascara because it's mess free. Totally recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful if you have time to work out clumps
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara can look really nice. Unfortunately it takes more work than my usual mascara (Lily Lolo).  This is coming from a former make up artist.  You have to clean so much product off the brush to even use it.  And if you're a wiggler (from lid to ends) it will clump even removing most of the product. I did find it goes on better if you go straight from root to tip without the wiggle. But it still can clump. It's definitely not a mascara you can put on in a hurry. For me it usually also requires an eyelash comb to comb out the clumps. If you have the time to puttz around with it it can be beautiful though. And I should also mention that sometimes it does transfer. Not all the time but definitely more than my staple. It does feel nice as well though, not hard.  I believe the indented portion of the brush may just be a little too indented picking up too much product.

reviews.review_title: Good product, not ideal or perfect
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of Ilia Fullest Volumizing mascara in exchange for my honest review. I did have some clumping and flaking so either I received a defective batch or the claims aren't entirely true.  It didn't irritate my eyes or cause any issues.  The large brush is an adjustment for me to get used to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The free product trial of Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara that I received from PinchMe is amazing. The volumizing formula is weightless & left my lashes feeling soft & full. There wasn't a waxy buildup after application. It washed off easily at the end of the night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara glides on smoothly and leaves behind full, lush lashes. There is no clumping or bunching. Very definitive spacing tho. It's like it coats each lash individually just enough to make it stand out on its own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is good for lengthening and natural look. It is very smooth and won't clump. Very easy to remove when washing your face and it will stay on throughout the whole day. I use it everyday, and people ask what mascara I use all the time.

reviews.review_title: Good mascara, wish it had a smaller brush.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from PINCHme. Overall I found that this mascara held up to it's smudge-free claims (although it did help that I set my eye area with powder before applying this mascara) but was easy enough to remove at the end of the day. It did make my lashes look fuller and the formula is buildable but I found that more than 2 coats made my lashes look really clumpy. My biggest issue with this mascara is the brush itself, I had a hard time maneuvering the brush to apply it on my eyelashes without getting it on the surrounding areas and I thought that the violin shape was more gimmicky than anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as an early release sample. The mascara is great as long as you do not have any issues with watering eyes or accidentally getting your eyes wet, it WILL run.  Plus sides:  Removal is very easy. It felt soft and comfortable on my lashes when I touched them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample from Pinchme and was not a fan. The mascara went on clumpy. I'll definitely not use again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara. It is a wet formula which is what I prefer. It's very black and makes your lashes really thick. You definitely need to be cautious not to make them chunky but once you get used to it they're sooooo dramatic. Also no flaking at all and it lasts really well. It's extremely easy to remove too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Worst mascara brush in existence. It holds onto WAY too much product and goes on extremely chunky!! Extremely frustrating to use. The actual mascara solution is nothing to write home about either. Extremely disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! I naturally have long lashes that curl on their own so I am only ever looking for some volume and this mascara does this. The biggest thing is since I have long lashes, this mascara does not give me raccoon eyesu2026 no black eyes, smudging, or cheek flakes, I love that! This is a no-brainer mascara, amazing! Goes on easy and dries in about 20-30 seconds depending on how much you put on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't wait to try this My daily mascara is ilia. But this was disappointing. The formula wasn't bad it was smooth and no clumps and distributed evenly on my lashes. There was no flaking or running. But my complaints are it didn't really volumize it was just like a regular mascara on my lashes and the brush was a bit to big.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely amazing mascara I've tried, it volumize my lashes and adds more length to them. This mascara is perfect for wearing everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh jeez. So bad. The brush is completely ineffective. It holds on to WAY too much product and the brush isn't fine enough to comb it out. You end up with spider lashes. Even when you strip the brush or swipe off the product it still deposits too much.  I use my Glossier mascara wand and dip it into the Ilia tube because I refuse to throw it out ($$$). This way I can do a few layers and really separate and lift my lashes. The formula is fine enough (a little wet) but the wand is useless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great mascara I really like how it doesn't clump and it makes my lashes really long and separated. What I don't like is how much product gets into the wand and it gets super messy. All in all a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Applies great. Smudges SO bad. Really disappointed because I love their other mascara.

reviews.review_title: Ok if you don't layer too much.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I heard such great things about the original Ilia mascara so thought I would try this one.  It does lengthen & separate easily at first and provides a nice easy look, but once you statt to layer it lashes tend to stick together too much.  And the worst thing about this formula is it doesn't dry down like normal mascaras.  The formula stays kind of wet.  If you get any little amount of tears, sweat or water - it immediately runs.  I understand this is not a waterproof formula but I have never seen anything like it.  This is best worn in very light single layer.

reviews.review_title: Not my favorite mascara do to the effects not last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not my favorite. Considering the price point it's staying power should be better. I felt like when initially applied my lashes looked good. However throughout the day it's effects seemed to wear off and my lashes looked limp. Seemed liked I would need to reapply the product. Received this product as part of a promotion from PinchMe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best mascara I've ever used. The packaging is attractive and the shape of the tube very sleek. This product left my eyelashes volumized and lengthy, also longlasting and waterproof. No clumps, which I loved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swear, the pics people are posting don't even do this justice. I love the other ilia mascara, but I usually prefer a look with more volume. Granted I always use a mascara primer, this is hands down my new favorite! It's buildable, so I can make it look more dramatic, but in no time my lashes are already thick and full with volume. I don't have to do a million layers to achieve what I'm going for. And it isn't clumpy! (For reference, I used to use the KKW beauty mascara or Charlotte Tilbury's legendary lashes volume 2 when I wanted a really full look, and this more than achieves the same if not better.) I'm so happy to have found a clean one that I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of Ilia Fullest Volumizing Mascara from Pinchme for my honest review. I loved this mascara! It is the best mascara I've ever used. So much length and added volume. The only reason I did not give five stars is because it did bleed a bit after sweating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love my new Ilia fullest voluminazing mascara, it gives me full volume an they look thicker and longer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the Ilia Fullest Volumizing mascara as far as giving volume goes. It doesn't lengthen very much which I missed. Can be a tad clumpy. It didn't seem to run under my eyes while I was working until about 6 hours in. I did put setting powder under my eyes to help with that. All in all it's not the best mascara. The wand is a tad big and not tapered enough for my taste but it does do what it says. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!! Makes eyelashes full and long! Also doesn't make my eyes itch at the end of day which is a problem I have with all mascaras. Stays on really well for a non-waterproof mascara! Also doesn't bleed on super hot days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the original Ilia mascara and was hoping this would be amazing but  it was not. It's so clumpy and unnatural that I had to use the wand from my other Ilia mascara to remove the clumps and separate my lashes. Unless you like that spidery clumpy look this mascara is not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is, hands down, the worst mascara I have ever used in my entire life. It was slick and didn't want to go on. The applicator is terrible and got mascara all over my eyelid, which I never have trouble with. And then all the mascara just fell off and gave me dark circles under my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. I have Sensitive eyes and this is the only mascara that doesn't cause my eyes to get itchy it leaves  my lashes super long and full looking! I don't use falsies so this is a major plus since it adds a lot of volume to my lashes! I love The new tipped applicator it's nice and large which helps apply the mascara perfectly. I will always use this as long as the formula doesn't change my new favorite highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it . Makes my lashes so long and look so full

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product does volumes , but with clumps. Also tends to flake and smudge after a couple of hoursu2026I will not be reordering it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best mascara brush I've ever used! Separates the lashes SO WELL while adding volume.

This is the worst mascara I've ever used; there are better brands at the drugstore. The brush is unwieldy, big at the ends and narrow in the middle, making it hard it get even coverage. It did nothing to thicken or lengthen my lashes, despite all the hype. It's hard for me to believe that they could get a good review without paying for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not as dramatic as in Ilia's ads, and it transfers to my upper lid and undereye. Not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I couldn't love anything more than the original Ilia mascara, but this is perfection. Truly the best mascara I've ever used. My coworkers thought I got eyelash extensions. It's so comfortable all day, and it doesn't flake off or lose any volume throughout the day. Almost mascaras irritate and burn my eyes after wearing 6+ hours and I've worn this literally 12+ hours with no issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OH. MY GOD. BUY THIS NOW. I was already loving the other ILIA mascara for the length it gave me, but I struggle more with volume. For years I swore by Better Than Sex by Too Faced, but then for some reason it started bothering my eyes. This is EVEN BETTER THAN THAT! AND it doesn't bother my eyes. And with even just ONE coat it looks so full. Can't recommend this enough. Next up: hopefully this in waterproof for pool/lake days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received as a free sample and will be buying the full size. Applies very easy and did not fall throughout the day. My lashes looked great all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I luckily got a deluxe sample of this mascara. It looks very pretty and seperates and volumizes well. Thats why im giving it 2 stars....my issue with this mascara is it runs...like crazy. Its so wet that even after 3 minutes if my lashes touch my upper lid it leaves black stains. Maybe it needs to dry out for a couple weeks but many mascaras, including drugstore do the same as this one does and doesnt run. The Maybelline in the long pink tube...sky high thats it...does a MUCH better job at a fraction of the price

This is the worst mascara I've ever used; there are better brands at the drugstore. The brush is unwieldy, big at the ends and narrow in the middle, making it hard it get even coverage. It did nothing to thicken or lengthen my lashes, despite all the hype. It's hard for me to believe that they could get a good review without paying for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not as dramatic as in Ilia's ads, and it transfers to my upper lid and undereye. Not worth it.
